 This product is just as expected, you get the goggles and controllers. The games are bought separately..but getting this around Christmas was helpful with the sales on games. My kids love it, my husband loves it and I do enjoy most games on it. VR is awesome!

Great headset. I do wish the graphics were just a little sharper (closer to PCVR) but it's no biggie. Only thing I recommend before buying is to have someone to play online with. Solo play/usage is cool but can get boring after a while. It's best as a social device.

My kid spent all his money on this thing and he’s not mad about. It’s kinda amazing and yeah the extra games etc are really expensive for my budget but the kids will spend hours with it. It’s been kind of a bonding experience. I tried it and it was really fun.

I have never experienced a more exciting game system. This is absolutely awesome!!! The graphics of most of the games are so real. First one I played, myst, long time lover of the game. This one brought tears to my eyes. So beautiful

This product has no parental controls whatsoever.  Within 5 minutes of setting it up, I heard strangers talking in my living room.  Went to see who was talking and it was random people talking to my teenage son through this headset.  Also do not like the fact that it still requires Facebook account to use the headset.  Bought it under the impression they were doing away with that requirement.
My 11 YO loves this, I haven't tried it yet, but she loves it and that's what matters.

I bought this as a present.  Couldn't send it because of the war.  Finally decided to open it and just make it my second unit.Doesn't work.  Outside the return window.  Need to send a brand-new unit in for warranty work.  Great.

Been gaming most of my life. Been considering an Oculus for quite some time, to pursue my developer hobby at 41 years of age.All I can say is that it's an awesome piece of entertainment tech to have around. Coming from normal screen gaming it takes some getting used to, but, its definitely very cool. Even my girlfriend thinks so, and she's usually not very much into techy things.Minor improvements which will help make it better is improved battery life, and a way to organise all your content in some way so it's easier to navigate the interface and find your favorite stuff.
This was an ideal Xmas gift for our grand child!

Have had problems with it which started with setup and now is not working at all. It shipped to me on August 31st and when I contacted Amazon yesterday they said I couldn't return it because it was past 30 day  Still working with Oculus support on replacement. I've tried all of their troubleshooting suggestions which has taken hours and hours of time and I still have a device that doesn't work.
review_title: Loved it for the two times it worked properly.

one_reviews_text: I got my oculus on August 25, 2021 and it hasn't even been a year. I've never in my life seen anything like this. It wasn't even on the charger for a long period of time and the oculus was completely melted. I need a replacement cause obviously this is not normal. I've been using this particular charger for over 3 years on my phone and I've charged my phone all night. My oculus might have short circuited or something because this can't be normal. I am super disappointed. 300$ spent on something that hasn't even lasted a year.

The setup to a PC was challenging. creating various accounts, downloading software and syncing to PC. The connection with a cable is slightly better than wireless. many of the steam games seem to have lag in the graphics or flickers that is annoying and not consistent.

Great product. After several months of use I have experienced absolutely no issues with the headset. Taking off one star for the head strap. You will need to purchase something a little more comfortable. New programs are constantly being developed so there seems to be something for everyone.

My daughter asked for this as a Christmas present. She was so excited when she got it. Graphics are awesome head fitting is great she wear glasses I was concerned about it but she didn’t have any problem using the VR with them on. And that’s a big + for this mom.
VR is so much fun once you get your VR legs! You can visit with faraway  friends, create 3D art, have a birthday party with loved ones, I LOVE IT!!!
review_title: Life ruiningly fun, I am 64 and its GR8

one_reviews_text: I bought these to watch 360 travel/tour videos, but the quality of the player was no where near what I expected. The image quality was like watching it on an old analog TV - definitely not HD.I didn't try any games or watching Netflix.My expectation was that the quality would at least be in the same ballpark as watching them on my flat screen - perhaps a little lower quality. Very disappointed, returning it.

I couldn't play my favorite games because stupid oculus didn't offer them.  There is so much light bleed from the nose hole that it's impossible to play.  I hated it so much.Edit:  they refused to refund it even though I sent it back to them a long time ago.

my son and myself had severe motion sickness from this game console. we were both unable to play the games after q day d/t this. I tried purchasing multiple different games and each one was the same result. super bummed, and unfortunately out of our money due to unable to return at this time.
Kids love this.  They actually get exercise and not just sitting .  Games are fun and there are many that are free.
review_title: This devise gets the kids up and off the couch.  They do get exercise.

one_reviews_text: Save your money and get a Valve index. This headset is just a cheap money grab by Facebook. As someone whos had VR for a few years now, this headset seems about 4 years behind.Low FOV, low refresh rate, blurry at best resolution, barely able to play most modern titles unless you get a link cable.You can also get an Oculus Rift if you really want to stay in the predatory Facebook ecosystem

Totally immersive environments are amazing, and new stuff is coming out.  The games are next level with total control of items used.  The movies and videos are fun, especially "adult" videos.The goggles are a bit heavy and can cause some issues with eye strain until you get used to it.  Downside is you have to get a Facebook or meta or whatever account so you know everything you do is tracked.Overall I like it alot

Works out of the box. Lasts about 2-3 hours depending on the game.You need a Facebook account to make an oculus account.You can also use your phone to stream the video from the oculus to the phone and watch what they are playing. Pretty cool.

At 61 I was hesitant to purchase something that I thought of as a toy. It is, but it's a whole lot more. I've been playing with 3D modeling and art. In just 2 weeks I've begun to sell my art and I've done a few things that I've converted to printable models.  An outstanding piece of tech at, what I think, is a good price.

I got for my son for Christmas I thought it cost quite a bit less it does not cover games. But there are a lot of free games that you can get online where there are quite a bit of people playing. It’s a lot different than other game systems. Lots of fun when you connect a family can see what you’re doing you’re playing
review_title: Kinda pricey but lots of fun

one_reviews_text: Kids loved it. Spent countless hour playing. Personally I wish I would have known that there are very few free games.  And a lot of those that are available are demos. The games can add up very quickly and can be quite expensive. It's the gift that keeps on requiring money.

Compre la version de 128gb y la verdad una experiencia que se la recomiendo a muchos, muy buen sonido, calidad de imagen muy buena, la bateria jugando si bien dura algo de 3hs aproximadamente, es bastante para ciertos usuarios, ahora si sos de jugar mucho ahi te recomiendo conectarle un powerbank, para jugar con pc uso airlink que de 10, al no tener cables es algo muy comodo, si estas en duda de comprarlo, yo te digo que lo hagas no te vas arrepentir para nada
Pros:- AmazingCons:- I'm addicted- Zuckerberg knows I'm addicted
review_title: Amazing standalone device for the price

one_reviews_text: This is my first vr experience with Oculus quest 2. I swear to God, vr is the future of gaming. Regarding to oculus quest 2, it is not fare to judge wether it good enough or not since I've already told this is my only first vr experience, but anyway this thing is worth it's price. WOW!
review_title: The best VR experience for this price.

one_reviews_text: I would definitely recommend this vr headset for anyone looking to start playing, or had played vr and is looking for a cheaper headset. It can basically play all the games the pc vr's can will being completely portable. With air link or a link cable it can be connected to a pc to play pc only games. I would also recommend buying an elite strap with it as well as the original strap does tend to hurt a bit after a few hours of game time. It can be a third market one like kiwi's. But all in all, its a great headset.

This was a great buy for our family! It is very entertaining for every age...if you don't get motion sick haha. Only thing I dislike is that there aren't many free games. Guess I should have expected it to be like every other console. But either way, it works great and is very cool to watch!

From the time I strapped the Meda Quest (a.k.a) Oculus Quest 2 to my head and turned it on I was hooked.The VR gaming is unmatched but there is sooo much more to this all in one headset.You can watch 3D movies on it in an app called Big Screen. There are places to go and just hangout and chat. And that is just scratching the surface.It is a great system for the money.
review_title: More Than Just A VR Game System

one_reviews_text: The head straps aren’t very sturdy but overall a nice product.This is a great stand alone system, especially if you’re new to oculus, however it would be nice for existing user to get discounts on items or games/DLC already owed on different oculus system.
review_title: Fun but will cost you money

one_reviews_text: The right controller stopped working after 1 week. They said mail it back and they would repair or replace. That was January 4th! Two months later still no right controller. Horrible customer service from Quest! Multiple requests sent to them.

Worked out of the box for about a week,  after that it became useless because of software keyboard malfunction. Others have had the same problem. On the company’s blog the problem has been “escalated”. I’ve gotten no response from the company. I think that it will eventually be fixed but definitely not ready for Christmas .I’m giving it another week for a solution but can’t give it as present as is. Will probably have to return it.

These are much cheaper on here than other websites...have been extremely pleased with ours...didn't do anything fancy like a case or anything but love playing with this and haven't had a need for a case or anything...just make sure it's put up after use so it doesn't get damaged

Simple incredible device... I spend hours and hours playing games and exercises.  My pops loves his and several friends have now purchased one of their own.  You will not be disappointed... UPDATED MARCH 12 ,2022.. left controller stopped working and was not able to get it working again... NOW I'M NOT VERY HAPPY WITH IT...I WAS TOLD TO DO EVERYTHING TO GET IT WORKING AND IT DID... I WAS TOLD TO FACTORY RESET IT AND I DID AND NOW IT'S EVEN WORST... I WAS ABLE TO PLAY SOME GAMES AND NOW I'M NOT ABLE TO EVEN DO ANY THING... GREAT WHEN WORKING PROPERLY...
review_title: Welp... loved it when it was working!

one_reviews_text: One of the best investments I've made all year as far as hobbies go!!!!!  Movie apps like Big Screen and Skybox are highly recommended!! Amazon Prime also has a good movie app! It's like being at a theater for real! If you're into movies but are skeptical about going to a theatre due to covid get you one right now!

Gave to my grandson for Christmas. He loves it. A small piece on top inside of it broke. Our last day to return was January 31st. Seems it should last longer then 2 1/2 months!!! Not impressed. He is not rough with it he’s 20 years old.

this is the best tech gift I've ever got for my kids. VR is going to be the wave of the future in technology- and not just for gaming. We're already seeing this tech used in manufacturing, medicine, military and conceptual design. This is the equivalent of getting your first personal computer back in the early 90's.

Lot of fun. Lots to do. Lot more accurate than our PSVR. I bought the Elite strap, I think its essential if you want to play a lot and you want the BEST fit as it has a tightening wring that secures it to your head. Over doubles the battery life as well!
review_title: Great non PC connected head unit.

one_reviews_text: I used an Oculus Quest for more than a year before I upgraded to the Quest 2. It is much easier to use, faster screen refresh and load time. I particularly like the ease of setting the fence and freedom from tethering.  For me it was worth the upgrade cost.

Lot of fun, so many different things to do and see and play. Games, experiences, music, relaxation, exercise, the possibilities are endless. Played one that belonged to a relative, bought my own that very night. I find new things to use it for all the time.
review_title: Lots to explore! It's not just gaming!

one_reviews_text: I am officially a VR addict. Experience other countries via YouTube 360, use a Bluetooth stationary bike to bike all over the world. Best invest I've made in a long time, and being able to break it into three payments made it even better.

So on Amazon’s part it was very good. Arrived in 3 days. Awesome, but on Oculus’ part is.....pretty bad. Headset is really cool I’m able to get free games. But when it comes to the app and putting in my payment method to buy games it just won’t allow me. And I’m not the only one, hundreds of people are having the same issue with contacting and getting support from oculus. It’s a gamble with this thing in my perspective, risk not being able to put a payment option on the device to buy games or just simply have a good working VR to play games on. It’s very frustrating that I payed $300 for this and can’t even play good games on it.

An incredible value for the price. I have enjoyed the continued support and updates making it really easy now to stream over wifi in your house with your PC. My son loves it too. Its great exercise for when you can't get outside.

I use this thing for everything!!! I go into virtual worlds and listen to books, I watch movies, I dance, I play, I exercise, I just escape!!! Matter of fact let me stop this review and go put it on!!! See ya there!!!

Bought this instead of a PlayStation 5 and I am not at all disappointed. Even when I bought it I wasn’t completely sure and now I have zero regrets about buying this. It is a perfect time to get into VR the tech is actually there.
The quest 2 overcame all my expectations. The resolution is great, the 120hz feature makes it even more fluid, and there are tons of free games to try!
review_title: To put it simply, it feels like a dream

one_reviews_text: Amazing device but trust if you don’t have will power I can see the purchases racking up quickly. They really should make the basic app programs a little richer or at least give you the option to try it out for two weeks before you have to pay.

This product line has the WORST customer support I have ever received. I got this for my father-in-law for Christmas and one of the controllers came broken. They determined I had to send it in and get it analyzed before getting help. It has now been 3 weeks and he still can’t use his device. I think it’s a fun product, but never go to them for tech support. Just terrible.

I really like the oculus obviously it’s lacking in some places like the charge doesn’t last that long and yes you have to have Facebook I don’t see that as a bad thing considering the oculus is a Facebook product so obviously they’d use their apps anyways it’s fun I do recommend

Delivery: It was a terribly long delivery to Vladivostok (Russia). From America quickly sent to Moscow, but in Moscow the parcel was in stock for a week. Delivers by UPS goods terribly, asks the same info twice, and responds for a long time.Helmet: The mount (where the speakers)  is for some reason a bit dirty, although the product is new. Hand tracking looks good, the helmet is fast, the picture quality in games is terrible, because even such a good processor does not pull the picture well in good quality without lags, but it's still cool. The controllers are very convenient. I hope VR will continue to develop, so far this technology is quite raw, but already fun.

Now that we are experiencing what  virtual reality is I think that it's time to give it a try and being honest with you I made the right decision,I'm living a magic experience but I got only one inquiry cause the battery does not lasts for too long(only for two hours and a half)and when you are in the climax your battery starts to die,improve it please.I have the oculus quest 2 with 256 GB.
It isn’t connecting to my android nor my tv. It hasn’t downloaded any games and I’ve googled everything I can. I haven’t even had it more than 6 hours.
If you ever have issues, don’t expect any help from the manufacturer.

The price is also very high, the quality is also very good, and the logistics is also fast! Bring it for the first time! Wow! This space is too real! Fun! Play rhythm lightsaber every day 🗡️🤟 But the battery can only play for about 2 hours and needs to be recharged
review_title: The price is also very high

one_reviews_text: We gave these to our kids for Christmas. It was great! The kids all had a great time playing with them and the adults had a great time watching them run into walls and talk to invisible foes, wiggle their butts and jump around and do karate chops and light saber fights. Hilarious. They are having a blast with these and their friends are all coming over to try them out. Solid purchase.
this isn't good for the price at all. bad tracking issues, facebook account needed, I would rather buy a used vive cosmos. then upgrade to a wireless system and get the elite faceplate

Literally this satisfied my itch of sword art online, I wanted to be in a game and this delivers, sometimes I lose sense of my surroundings and I'll end up hitting my ceiling fan or my tv, I recommend placing a rug or something under your feet so you dont go to far off to the sides and you stay centered. Youd think it would break the emerson but it dosnt, your brain will subconsciously recognize how far you can go without it affecting the game play at all. Good exercise to
And then there’s the Facebook problem....I finally decided to spend it back and spend time in the real world instead

I was very concerned how the VR affects vision health, since the focus is so close to the eyes, not sure if any data is available or not. Using the unit for 10 minutes or so makes my face tired with the heavy unit stuck to my face.
review_title: Seems the VR a health hazard to me

one_reviews_text: I'm not a gamer. Neither are my kids.... But we Love the oculus. We play it almost every day. I use it for the exercise games.
bad controls, only kids games and almost no VR proper content. I tried this technology 5 years ago and apparently still the same today.  Maybe a little bit better image? yes but still not very good.
review_title: Years on the market and still a beta product. It is a waste of money.

one_reviews_text: I do not have any experience with VR to compare this to, but this thing is crazy. I believe the things they will be able to do in the future with VR will be mind blowing. If I have one complaint, I will say it could be a little more comfortable.

I love it and use it almost every day. I used the link cable briefly for a couple days and the port quickly got damaged. You can't see the damage, but now when I plug it in to charge, slight motions cause it to loose contact and stop charging.
review_title: Love it, but it's not perfect

one_reviews_text: Got this for my boyfriend for Christmas. Then I had to go get one as well. Bc this thing is so cool! The price considering the experience you get with this is totally worth it! So much fun! Highly recommend virtual reality game system thing!

Brand new doesn't work. Technical support sucks and so does the handling of the replacement parts. The manufacturer and Amazon were little help. Neither have a controller to send out. The manufacturer says I may receive a refurbished controller once they receive my brand new non functional controller. Buyer beware.
review_title: The right controller was bad straight out of the box.

one_reviews_text: This is such a fun gadget! My ONLY complaint is that they do not have Minecraft or Google Earth for it :(

My poor Vive is now a dust collector because of the Quest 2.  No screen door effect!I end up using AirLink to play all my steam games and it works great!Population One is my go to game!  Along with Walkabout Mini Golf
review_title: So much better than the HTV Vive (original).

one_reviews_text: it suks , same problem that everyone getsit makes u do a pattern then when go to use your oculus 2 it wont accept the pattern you made and there is no to reset ittech laughed at me and said there was no problem

The shipment arrived almost week early! I had a quick set up to make sure everything is working properly and the headset is even more compact than i realized! Easy strap adjustment,comfortable eye-screen placement and repositioning ability and high quality graphics on the stand alone device!

Order this oculus quest two for Christmas two days before Christmas day and it came on Christmas Eve just in perfect timing my kids loved it and I loved it probably even more so I ordered another one the next week the price is amazing in this game or gaming system I should say it’s absolute incredible
review_title: The MOST fun for me the ‘MOM’ 😁

one_reviews_text: Teenage son wanted this for Xmas. We've had one in the past with our S7 edge. Oh how far the Oculus VR has come. We had a blast playing the games that came with it and I even bought a few others so we could have choices. Great for family entertainment!!!
Grandkids loved it. I played it a little bit and was surprised how much I liked it. Great Christmas gift for them.

These VR glasses fits great on my head and the controller's are extremely easy to use. The picture quality is also extremely clear, almost like your in the video or game... Very Happy and would refer them to everyone.
review_title: VR glasses that fits on your head like a glove!

one_reviews_text: An amazing piece of next generation tech in an EXTREMELY CHEAP flimsy package.  The strap, frame and padding actually hurt my face out if the box.  After replacing all three, I've made it comfortable enough to use.  You will spend WAY more than $299 in the end. $80 freaking dollars for a USB cable...wtf?
The Oculus Quest 2 is an affordable VR experience, for $300 it can't be beat. The games are not on par with PC VR but, for a standalone wireless system you can't complain.

This unit is so much fun, and EXCELLENT of working out! Has a lot of games to choose from. My one complaint is the factory head strap is NOT comfortable for long game play or exercise. I would suggest getting one of the many replacement head straps.
stuck in trying to update.  this was a lot of money for something that only works for 1 month.  not happy at all and I can not return because the last return date was 12 days ago
review_title: one month and now it is not working at all

one_reviews_text: Overall the product is awesome! Though to make it comfy to wear and use for long term,  you have to drop a hundred or so more into it. Biggest gripe I have with it is the 3 point IPD adjustment. For me I'm in between,  so its always blurry.

My son's got to play it for a few days then it stopped connecting to my wifi and would not let anything load so I asked the supplier to replace it and I will send the one I have back . They never mailed it . I work at the post office so it's like they made the shipping label for it but never mailed it out . Even tho Amazon says the package was lost . I got my refund but I wanted my kids to enjoy the system . I didn't care about the money .

As a streamer and gamer, my son spends a lot of time gaming and chatting back and forth with his friends. However, I would on occasion knock on his door to see if he was awake, alive(teenager on a game). Once, I gave his the Occulas 2 for Christmas, now it's a "NONSTOP PARTY!" It's no longer quick chats, but entire conversations, music, laughing. And he is up and moving and really stimulating his body in exercise with boxing, watching movies with friends....THE BEST MONEY SPENT! I'm getting one next.

definely spend the extra money for 256 version, as the apps and get better, the files get larger.  adjust the head straps for maximum comfort.  there are stores with demos popping up, try before you buy

I have had so much fun playing this with my family. The headset is super fun and the games are great. I am obsessed with the mini golf game that makes it feel real. I also love the climbing game. i recommend the oculus to all my friends. Just get it, you won't regret the purchase.

Amazing, but as a very older gentleman, it becomes very uncomfortable very quickly. Waiting for the day when vr is just a pair of glasses.  I have no faults even though I enjoyed the Go much better because it is more simple.
I'm 68 years old.... I dont know how I ever lived without VR. So much fun Iove it.

I got the quest 2 about two months ago and it was not a bad move at all. Not only if it super immersive since it's cable free. It's also an amazing conversation starter. Not many people have gotten to try VR still, and the quest 2 is in my opinion the best device to be introduced on. I will say however, you should not get the quest if you're looking for something to replace an old console, as being an all in one system,As the battery life isn't the greatest. If your looking for an addition to your gaming collection, the quest 2 is where its at!

I had the PS VR system and this one is definitely better. Its lightweight and the video quality is superb. The only reason I give 4 stars is because the headband doesn’t fit well in any head and you have to add/buy another product to improve. Other than that its great and surpassed my expectation

My 12-year-old son asked for an oculus for Christmas and I was a bit nervous because he is really into tech and would notice if I got the wrong thing. He was thrilled with this present and has used it every day since. It keeps him active and entertained.
We all love the oculus! A must buy, can’t wait for more games to come out for it.

Very fun and some games can be played without the motion sickness. I have never been motion sick. I owned boats for years and was a captain and saw many get sick when I didn't. But the VR made me fall down. Gamed say sitting but you may have to stand to see the entire play area. Then the character moves while you don't. My head spun. Games with teleport like  resident evil didn't cause this issue. VR is fun but my game choice is limited. My wife was worse than me with the motion issue.

I purchased for my son last September and bought all the carrying cases babied the thing made sure of it and now it won't turned on won't take a charge changed charging cables plugins everything I can think of.

This should NOT scare you to buy this amazing headset. I used it for about two months and suddenly it bricked itself due to what I assume was a bad firmware installation. This is a very rare case though. Otherwise this product is great. Used it with my pc a lot via air link and cable link, both worked perfectly. The hardware is awesome too, getting a replacement soon and should not take too long.
review_title: Amazing headset, a few issues though

one_reviews_text: This is purely a quest review from someone who didn't use any VR devices. The moment I've put on that device... I've entered a different world. This feels futuristic. I know most people hate Facebook, but i don't mind its presence in my home.This is a great product, i was worried I've overpaid for some "gimmick" but now am glad I've spend my money on something awesome.And the delivery smooth.
review_title: Product is awesome. Delivered on promised date

one_reviews_text: The product itself is amazing but I was supposed to receive a $50 Amazon credit for using code OCULUS50 at check out.
review_title: I didn't receive my $50 Amazon credit for purchasing this item on cyber Monday

one_reviews_text: Don't have any major complaints and throughly enjoy the system as a whole. Being able to affordably play VR opens a whole new world to me however the headset does strain both head and eyes after a while so not suggested for long term use. other then that loving my Quest and hope to continue to do so for the foreseeable future

the software is excellent but the mechanical design of heaset is very bad. front of the device is very heavy and the straps are very poorly designed. giving one star because the device feels like used one but i paid for a new product.
review_title: very  heavy device , straps very poorly designed.

one_reviews_text: This VR headset is a solid VR headset, for the quality (4K), runtime, games, handling, and almost every thing about this headset you’re getting an amazing deal. It doesn’t come without a few bugs, but usually (like most things) turning it off and back on helps a lot. Love the exclusives (especially RE4) Beautiful quality and tracking. Not to mention completely wireless. Great customer service and warranty services.
review_title: Solid machine, THE best VR headsets out there for the price

one_reviews_text: The young teenagers were sooo happy to get this gift. I was impressed with the quality of the product and the clarity of the images. Don’t play it myself so can’t comment on that but the kids were out of this world. Amazing tech.

great value for the price. using air link with my desktop os not too bad of an experience. limited options in the productive app. having to buy games again you already own on steam is not a great feeling
review_title: minus 2 star of viciously locking the software

one_reviews_text: Bought this headset on Christmas for the kids because my six year old stated specifically, he wanted a VR. It is very interactive and responsive with every app so far. Setting up for small children is tough with calibration setup but I recommend downloading the Oculus App. Games can rack up some cost and storage so 256GB is my recommendation as well.
Had for 3 months. Still can’t sign in. It’s just a brick. Buy something else.
review_title: Facebook customer support is awful. Run away

one_reviews_text: best entry level VR experience which doesnt require a high-end PC to render. Good collection of games library and Videos. You could also get the Oculus link if you want to play PC games, like Steam VR games :).Also ppl with glasses i suggest using prescription VR lens or Contact lenses while using the Head Set.

Yup. Brand new laptop with 3080, and Windows 11.You can get it to work by using cable link! Just ignore messages it is not supported. Install Occulus app, set up device, using cable. Then install SteamVR. It should detect headset and you can play games.

will glitch after a few uses then if you try to return they'll charge you restocking fee. it is ok for about 3 plays then is ruined and they dont care they just take your money. games are costly and useless on a glitching game

I'm sure if you are looking at reviews, you are comparing what kind of VR headset to get.  No matter what, get one!  Got this for my son and love the fact that it has him up and moving.  I even played some of the games like Beat saber and had a blast
Thus is literally the best purchase I have ever made! You will JIT REGRET BUYING ONE!!!
review_title: It’s beyond fun. It’s a lifestyle changer

one_reviews_text: Oculus Quest 2 exceeded my expectations, I got more, it's an incomparable virtual reality experience that I had.  This is my first VR device and I am completely satisfied with the purchase. It is convenient to watch movies, games, social interactions and many things that I have yet to try in VR, it is easy to connect to a computer and all this wirelessly via wifi.  I used international shipping and the package arrived on another continent in less than a month. Еverything is very efficient and without delay, the package was easily tracked, everything is super convenient with it.

This was a birthday present for someone who has everything. It was a home run. Easy to set up and be was enjoying it within minutes after unwrapping. So much to discover. I think he'll be enjoying this for a long time.
Product is great but the $50 gift card redemption does not work. I purchased before November 29 and was unable to redeem it. Now I can’t find the Reedem link anywhere.

I purchased this for my wife at Christmas and she's used it every single day since.  She is NOT a gamer at all but this VR with beatsabers and dance central provides her a fun exercise experience she didn't know she wanted.

The item description fails to mention YOU have to have a Facebook account to use this. It FAILS to mention you have to be 13 years or older to use it because you have to be at least 13 to have Facebook. And was warning about its size not designed for younger players. It is NOT easy to set up because we are stuck on the having no Facebook account. And Facebook is not good on privacy. They sell your info to much. I wish the item warned us we HAD to have FAcebook before it was bought. Seems like false advertising. They are forcing us to get unwanted Facebook after already paying $300.

Received a headset that was previously used and had someone else logged in. Had to figure out how to do the factory reset on the headset since it wouldn’t connect to the app. After the reset it works fine. Thinking I should’ve just returned it for an actual new one since now I’m worried about how long it was used and the battery life. But it seems okay.

It may not be the most high end VR HMD out there, but for the price it's definitely the most versatile. It can play all Quest and Oculus games, SteamVR, VIVE Port, etc. Plus, you can play any Quest game wirelessly, and any PCVR game wirelessly with the correct hardware.
It’s crazy how well the VR is in this headset. First time user ever and beyond impressed. So happy with the purchase.

Awesome quality with amazing, realistic graphics that bring the game to life. Fun for entire family too and is a super good price. Gave this to my son for Christmas, now it’s the only thing he plays with, Highly Recommend!

Me gusta lo que puedes hacer con ellos jugar juegos y ver videos y películas, lo que no me gusta es la bateria,  no dura mucho tiempo de 1 a 2 horas, el cargador pareciera ser genérico barato de mala calidad, igual la correa para sujetar, no se ajusta bien a la cabeza y tiende a bajarse las gafas, otra cosa que  o me gusta es que  o he logrado conseguir una imagen nítida, todo se ve un poquito borroso y a la larga cansa la vista mucho

We have had nothing but problem with this headset. At first it started glitching so I did a factory reset. Then, it didn’t have any of my sons apps appear as purchased and any time he tried to go anywhere it went back to his Home Screen so I did another factory reset which worked for two days. Now the headset is glitching again and stays on loading anytime he tries to enter an app. I attempted to call customer  support, was on hold for 10Minutes then rerouted to a voicemail. Very unhappy right now.
review_title: We have had nothing but problems with this headset

one_reviews_text: Amazing product. Well made. Haven't had any issues with it. Great technology in such a small and wireless package. The oculus link feature alone makes it worth every penny. Streaming high fidelity PC exclusive VR games straight to my headset with virtually no latency is incredible. Hats off to the oculus team.  Love it. If you're going to buy one though just make sure you also get at least a 10-16ft usb C charge cable for long plug as you play sessions, and a different premium head strap for better comfort. And for glasses wearers like myself prescription VR lens from somewhere like VR Wave are the best investment, trust me.
review_title: Amazing product for the right price.

one_reviews_text: What an amazing Christmas gift. If you haven't tried one go to a friends house and try it. There is nothing like sitting in your living room and flying over the grand canyon or looking for sea turtles in the ocean. You really feel like you are right there. Plenty of things to do on it for free.

The Oculus 2 is pretty awesome. There is a good variety of games, environments, exercise apps and medication apps. Only downside so far is some of the videos are very pixelated but some are very clear as well. Doesn't hold charge for too long either.

Though it may take a while to set up (depending on your Internet speed) it is really worth the purchase. It's got a variety of games and it's compatible with some PC games too which make it all even more diverse. Extremely fun. Have to be careful though cuz it tends to get nauseous using it for a while so remember to take breaks often.

First off, love the headset, 10/10 on the fun factor, it's just not very visually impaired friendly. Takes a bit to figure out how to put it on with glasses without smudging themOther than that, solid product, can't really complain

A lot of cool things about it: PC compatible,  optionally wireless, motion tracking anywhere without setting additional hardware.This pricetag is literally a license to steal, best thing on the market, especially if you are new.One thing to note that to use PC VR, 5Ghz or WiFi6 router or Link cable (which is sold separately) is necessary, another - avoid direct sunlight from going through the lenses, this might and actually will permanently damage your screen.This brought me new experience in gaming which I didn't have for maybe last 10 years, watch out for your pets and furniture, stay safe and enjoy.
review_title: Can't believe I finally got one

one_reviews_text: The oculus is an incredible piece of tech. My only issue is how expensive the games are. I completely understand that the game companies need to make money, but there’s a certain level where we should be able to buy the device with one pre installed game, like BeatSaber or Galaxy’s Edge, or whatever, so the Oculus isn’t basically useless until you can buy a game. The games also average from 15-40 dollars, some with add ons even after the initial 40$ price point. My only problem with the Oculus is the game costs.
review_title: Oculus Quest 2 is an expensive dream

one_reviews_text: I had been skeptical of VR headsets because I have always had issues with motion sickness when using them in the past.  I haven't had that issue at all with the Quest 2.  It's been really enjoyable, without any issues.
review_title: I'm really enjoying this VR set.

one_reviews_text: This is our families 2nd headset.  Best purchase of my life possibly.
This is my 1st VR headset and it has been an absolute nightmare just to pair the set to the Oculus app. By the way, I'm still in the nightmare! 👎
It is a nice headset for money but you probably will need elite strap and battery pack but other then that it has nice lenses good graphics controllers are very durable overall a 4 ⭐️

just get it it is worth every penny.the only downside I have experienced is the battery only lasts for 2.5 hoursThis seems like a lot, but with friends over it can go by really quick.pro- If you have a PC you can use an air link/oculus link cable to use your PC for a real pcvr experience.

It's amazing how far VR has come. I've played several games and they were Immersive and fun, Beat Saber and the Star Wars games were awesome!We swapped out the head strap which isn't the best and make sure to attach the gel insert which can be easily wiped down.
review_title: Wasn't sold on VR til now!

one_reviews_text: Built quality is great. I only play ping pong on it but there are tons of games and things to do. I also tried some fitness games. Most of the good games cost you money and there is barely any good free content.

We love the VR worlds feel real , I can only use it for an hour, then I feel sick and nauseous, the monthly fee for my favorite sports games is very expensive, so I can only enjoy some paid 3D movies or VR 360 videos on YouTube.

If you like hanging out with 10yr olds it might be okay. Also it's really bad with glasses. The lens adjustment only has three settings, which didn't work out for me at all. Basically I was blind, uncomfortable, and surrounded by children. No thanks.
review_title: Not ready for prime time. Wait a few years.

one_reviews_text: This has been so much fun for all ages! Beyond worth the money, we take it with us to family gatherings and get everyone moving and playing, it’s so much fun to both play and watch others play!
bought this for my son and he is elated

So while i was playing with the occulus quest it was fun to play with, when you have friends. There isn’t enough games but most of them are fun. I was disappointed when i needed a more powerful computer just to plug in my head set so now its just its own stand alone thing i guess

This is completely awesome! For the price you get all the awesome sick tummy feels. I'm talking about the VR railroad tracks. Please try VR before buying. For the price you get one heck of a set up! I highly recommend!

My husband and I have been playing Beat Saber all night and have been having a blast! Also, I tried The Room and it is amazing. The only downside is my husband has big hands and the controllers are a little small for him.
All his friends had this so we finally caved.  Glad we did.  He networks and they all play virtual games (mostly physical) together. Great entertainment and way to relax on homework breaks

The product gave me to much problem to create an account, and to buy games it was worst.The right controll stop working two months after I bought the equipment and they have made me wait hours to send me a new controll and make me talk the same thing with more the FIVE persons in one night. They said they working on it, but the just jump the case from one person to another!!!!DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY AS ME
review_title: The support if you haVe a  issue is a scam

one_reviews_text: We had the occlusion rift s first and had issues with computer compatibility so we couldn't play it.  Charged after we out of the box and my son has been playing it ever since. Great graphics great audio great immersion.  We love it
After waiting months and months for one of the new PS or another game console to become available for sale, I opted for the Oculus.I could NOT be happier for that decision.Cheers to Meta.

Got this gift for my 12-year-old son and he plays with this item at least 4 times a week.  He can connect with his friends which he loves, and they can feel like they are together even when they can't be.
The screen is beautiful but it’s to expensive to not have games to buy that are worth playing very limited on games to play I do not like that almost like a waste of $$$$$ money for the price
review_title: Not enough games to pick from that would be worth playing

one_reviews_text: Works great wirelessly. battery life could be better. Enjoyed it for two months. Then last week, a month after the return period ended, the lower third of the screens start to turn white while connected with Link only. Oculus has apparently known about it for over two years. Hundreds of users affected. Still no fix.Only buy if you never intend to do PCVR or plan to play anything on the Link Store for the higher graphics.

I'm just getting a feel for the different apps and had an amazing time with the TV app and taking a ride on a weather baloon to the upper atmosphere. That was AMAZING. Then I played Vader Immortal and it was like all my life's ambitions have been realized.  You have to remember to recharge after every session of play, but it is worth that to understand THE POWER OF THE DARK SIDE OF THE FORCE!!!
review_title: Even more fun than I expected it to be.

one_reviews_text: They are currently experiencing an issue where the initial downloads required to set up and use the Oculus Gail to initialize. Don’t buy one right now, I will update this after they fix the issue

I'm so glad I was able to get my 11yr old son an Oculus Quest 2 for Christmas!! It was his most requested item and his "big gift." I can't wait to see the look on his face when he opens it! I love that it was here the very next day thanks to Amazon Prime! The fact I can also purchase all the accessories and case for it on Amazon as well makes it even better!

the product is good and fun but there is a noticeable blemish on mine that hasn't gone away since I opened it from the box and turned it on besides that its well worth the buy I'm happy at least. also keep in mine you will need batteries to go along with this for the controllers I recommend rechargeable or you will buy batteries fairly often if you play vr occasionally like I do
review_title: good but mine has a screen/lens blemish that never goes away no matter what I've tried

one_reviews_text: Santa brought this for my daughter for Christmas  :) and I’m definitely gonna be playing it when I can lol super cool worth it for sure can’t imagine them getting any better but apparently they do just super expensive!

Love the oculus just don't like the fact that after I purchased it they started giving out $50 credit. So I was going to return it but was told not to worry because they were giving all customers who purchased before black friday a $50 credit to use in the oculus store. I still haven't received an email yet.

Outstanding device. Will take you to a different world. I am glad that I purchased it. Do not under any circumstances listen to negative reviewers as I am sure they hate everything including themselves!

I ordered the Oculus Quest 2 to try out the Virtual Reality/Metaverse Hype but upon using it, I am all in to the idea of Virtual Reality/Metaverse. It is super immersive with surround sound and realtime changes. The two controller that come with it are enough to perform everything imaginable in the virtual world.The beat saber game is already my favorite one and have been continuously since it arrived
review_title: Oculus Quest 2 is Immersive and Real Time

one_reviews_text: Along with the Quest 2, I have a Supernatural app membership. It has provided hours of great exercise and entertainment.  It gets so much use at my house we're considering a 2nd purchase!
review_title: HOURS AND HOURS OF GREAT FUN!!

one_reviews_text: A sneak-peak into the future - VR technique is good enough to be real productivity.However, the balance of weight is not well-designed though - front is too much weight.  Will feel sour on the neck pretty quick.
review_title: Tried at a friend's place and bought it

one_reviews_text: I spent the better part of 8 hours trying to troubleshoot which came to be a defective right controller. Support is horrendous. Beware if you get a defective controller your out of luck. I was soo excited to try this. I will never buy from Facebook or Meta or oculus again.
review_title: Absolutely the worst product ever made

one_reviews_text: Picked this up cause I keep missing out on PS5's, am quite pleased with it so far. Probably going to want to upgrade the included straps to ones more comfortable and that have or support a battery pack.
great item.  Suggest you get the larger hard drive.  If you plan to wear for long period of time, buy a better strap. The one that comes with is fine for short amount of time.

I owned HTC Vive, Lenovo Explorer, and Samsung Odyssey+ and I must say that Oculus Quest 2 beats them all!Superior image, versatile functionality, easy to use. A lot of cozy features like a VR sofa and even hand tracking! A lot of must-have VR games were ported to the Oculus Quest platform. And keep in mind that you can still connect it to Steam and play your favorite games from your PC.Just amazing.

Everything was great. My son was super happy with it. But the battery lasts 45 minutes on 100% charge before it has to be plugged back in. That is super annoying and frustrating. Can't even play it for a full hour

Amazon states this game is for “Everyone 10+”.  THIS IS ABSOLUTELY NOT TRUE.  A Facebook account is REQUIRED in order to use this gaming system. Children under 13 are prohibited from creating a Facebook account. There should be a disclaimer stating such.
Be it games or virtual chat... My Grandson says he loves being able to get social with his friends, the avatar makes it seem like he's right there with them, at least that's what he has told us.
It's fun at first but you get used to it after 2 hours. Honestly though its very addictive and has a great wow factor at first. But its too much of a pain to set up and use.
My son loves this. It is really cool. It seems like you are really in the games. Like watching movies on it also.

After using Oculus 2 for 4 months now the library app is unavailable. Nothing works and cannot reconnect after the latest update. I can't find anywhere to report the problem or try to access the account. In dialogue with the AI chat, it keeps telling me not to do anything with the account. I am highly frustrated at the lack of customer service and will be checking out other VR platforms in the future if this isn't rectified soon. Meta =MEGA problem.
My son really wanted the Meta Quest 2 for Christmas.  We have a blast playing it and it has been four months since we purchased and it is still going strong.  Fan for life!
Awesome, I love when my family members become speech less when they try it on

I was nervous that I wouldn't be able to play VR games from computer, but with airlink I can play them easily, I am playing Boneworks right now and I recommend it. Only problem I have is if someone is using the wifi, then airlink starts to lag, so I usually play it only when I am alone at home. Also while using Airlink, you need to use lan cable on your computer, also you need to be close to your router for a good experience. It also has it's own app store and games too and they don't require any other device like a computer, you can just start your VR headset and play/use them.
review_title: This is my first VR headset and I am loving it.

one_reviews_text: It's really a pain for people that require glasses to see clearly to put on the headset. You will have to put your glasses inside the headset first, and then put on the headset on your head with your glasses together.Also, I only used the headset for a month, and there is already some scratch on the lenses, most likely caused by the glasses frame. Thankfully it doesn't affect my vision in VR at the moment, but I have to order a Quest 2 lenses protector on Amazon to prevent further damage to the lenses.
review_title: Also buy a Quest 2 lenses protector if you need glasses to see

one_reviews_text: Headstrap ripped off within a couple days of use. The sensors would lag and it would ask me to redraw a boundary often.

Loved the product for its immersive capabilities and image quality, but ultimately had to return due to the severe nausea I experienced every time I used it. I realize I may be a rare case, but important consideration for a $300+ device. Hoped it would get better, but after two weeks of trying to “build a tolerance”, I had to make the decision to send it back.

In all seriousness, love the VR headset. Easy to use, set up, get app running, even my 3 y/o likes to play with it. There is a limited number of free games or apps, and that’s why I say bye bye money! Once you get hooked it will be charge after charge but it’s worth it!

Great product really was happy at first. But the blurriness of the lens is causing me to strain my eyes and give me headaches.  I have a history of headaches and every single time I use it I get an immediate headache.  Unfortunately going to have to return it. If you get headaches stay away this will definitely trigger them and intensify them.
review_title: Will trigger headaches if you get themt

one_reviews_text: My son isn18, and is enjoying it. We both feel that VR has a long way to go, I don't see very many interesting options for games, but he's happy with it nonetheless. Wish there were more options for "good" games.
Exactly what they wanted, very nice.  It was a bit difficult to setup w/ FB account issues, but once it was done the system worked as expected.  I tried it, too, and can confirm that it is fun.  :)
This system is a lot of fun, the whole family has been enjoying it. Only downside is you need a real Facebook account linked to the headset and occasional bugs with new updates.
Works well and my son enjoys it alot

Really like this so far! Lots of good apps and experiences.Package doesn't come with headphones (doubt I can use my wireless ones without lagging sound). Stock strap is eh. The silicone/rubber interface has wrinkles in it and let's a huge amount of light through around the nose. So ordered a different silicone interface. Also doesn't come with lens covers for when not being used.

I love the quest 2 and the games that are supported  but it can be better. 1 the battery life is horrible only giving you about 30 minutes of playtime before you have to charge it. 2 if you want to buy a game you need to put in your quest pin and they only show you it once and it's through the quest app so if you forget your pin you have to make a new one. 3 if you leave the quest plugged in for a long period of time the charging port will melt. Do I recommend the quest 2? yes just make sure you have a way around all the problems listed.
I bought this as a Chrsitmas gift for my son who's earlier generation Oculus had broken after 4 years. He swears by these! He loves the virtual play. Now, if only I can get there to see it in action!

I like the experience of VR, but the cost & fit (not so easy to set it up to get sharp). The App's cost money, not a lot is for free. The headset is heavy & hurts in the back of the head after a while.
review_title: It's a great experience but expensive & not so easy to use.

one_reviews_text: Desde que empezó la pandemia lamentablemente por problemas economicos tuve que volver a la casa de mis padres. Gracias al Oculus Quest 2 no he hablado con ellos por 5 meses. Casi como si no estuviesemos en la misma casa. Maravilloso.
I did not think a kid could sweat this much playing with this thing- he loves this thing. Better than the ps4 in that respect. My older son gets seasick every time though and can’t play.
Its hard to get to the right position for the lenses to be not blurryAnd the battery dies fast I thought mine was defected I did replace it but still the sameBut still fun to have

Family gift that is getting lots of use.  Didn't realize what games cost when I purchased it so be prepared to drop an additional hundred or so to get a good assortment of games initially.  Included silicone face cover is nice but man does it cause you to sweat.
review_title: Tons of fun, games can add up

one_reviews_text: My boys love this oculus. Just make sure your parameter is wide and large enough so you don’t knock over lamps or swing and hit a table when playing. Best virtual reality game ever.

My 16 year old got one for his birthday and after the whole family played with his Oculus, my 6 year old decided he just had to have one of his own for his birthday. While the cost may be a little discouraging at first, I'm glad that I decided to purchase it. It keeps the kids entertained for hours. If I had more time to enjoy it, I would consider ordering one for myself. I definitely 10/10 recommend.
review_title: Great entertainment for me and my kids

one_reviews_text: I have my own and every one I introduce this to wants and gets one also. A must!!
My son has shamed for this gaming system for some time. The kits includes all that was needed to play. Only down fall is games to play on it are around $25 USD that I have seen so far.

review_title: Lo mejor en juego para la familia

one_reviews_text: My family loves this thing! We purchased some block-breaking game and you can get a decent, fun workout with it on the harder levels. The features that let you explore other places is really neat too!

I went back and forth about buying the Oculus... Ended up buying it, I would recommend this for everyone. Very entertaining, futuristic to see technology at it's best. And if you are not in shape (Creed), this game will let you know 😂😂😂 I looked as if I was dancing while having a seizure. Just Get It, you will not be disappointed.
This technology blew me away. I had no idea they were so advanced. Kids love it and so many games and simulations exist. The first game I played was a WWI bi plane simulator. It was breathtaking
it terrible. its not ready for the market yet. it needs to reboot after any inaccurate movements. this item isn't ready for use. its worse the alfa - beta testing stage.
review_title: its not ready for the market yet

one_reviews_text: I absolutely love this product , it’s an amazing experience and affordable. It’s best to play in large open space , games like Walking Dead was too scary for me and I kind of bumped to my furniture/walls a lot and almost broke my controllers.

Gifted my grandson this for his 19th birthday.  He loves the fit and ability to easily adjust it on his head.  He said it’s a very good quality and not cheap like his previous one that broke when making a head adjustment.  It was money well spent for me.

We liked the product but then after 2 days of usage, we had to return it as it led to sever headache. Though usage was limited to 15-30 minutes only but still the effect of that visual is more on the body to handle.

Definitely a cool experience but wearing the head gear is really annoying and you need really need a 36 square foot area to be able to play without hitting something. This is a problem in a house with multiple people trying to move around especially if you have multiple players trying to play multiplayer. Overall it is a good experience. I think this is kind of what Blackberry was to smartphones... Just getting going as far as hardware and graphics go
You charge the battery for 2.5 hours and you can only play it for 2.5 hours not satisfied

Resident Evil 4 VR alone makes this thing a MUST buy! I bought one and let my friends try it and now they all want one too. My one gripe is the battery life is almost atrocious, it almost takes longer to charge the thing than playing it on a full battery and it blows but it's understandable and it has a long charger you can buy for it. Overall Playing RE4 and experiencing YouTube in like a theatre setting and playing VRChat with friends has been a blast and I'm glad I bought it, great present for a kid or dad!
review_title: It's a lot of a fun!

one_reviews_text: The app couldn't find the headset, couldn't buy games because of a pin I was told I set and didn't wouldn't work. I couldn't reset the headset, pin, facebook account, and pattern. The headset and app denied the pattern I set it to be and I couldn't reset it with the pin I was supposedly was given that I didn't receive. Horrible experience. I should have read the reviews on the oculus. Had to return it

Better than quest 1 especially no more screen door effect and it's sharper overall, and cheaper than the previous model. Got a link cable, the official case and headband and so far I've played more VR than ever before!
review_title: Best headset I've used so far

one_reviews_text: I’d give this a 3 1/2 if I could.This console is amazing, I’ve absolutely loved playing this not only because of the VR experience. Because it’s portable, supports Microphone and Audio, and works just like a computer.The games however are extremely pricey in my book and the battery doesn’t last a very long time.I would hope in the future that oculus would have a special subscription like Xbox gold. Not to connect with friends but to have great deals on games. Kinda like the Xbox game pass.
review_title: Awesome Device, But the battery needs a tune up.

one_reviews_text: Resolution is really bad. All your games will be blurry. I have good hardware, I played HL:Alyx via official cabel - it is bad. Also the most bad thing - the connection to the Oculus servers is always required and it is not stable.  Why do I need connection to Oculus servers for games in my SteamVR, this is really stupid idea. If connection is not stable - your game starts glitching.
review_title: Worst way to spend your money

one_reviews_text: I'm returning the device.  I  don't have, don't want and won't get a Facebook account.  There is some hints that this requirement may end next year, but the FB announcement is vague and unhelpful.
review_title: WARNING! this requires a Facebook account

one_reviews_text: You need to use your true facebook account for this or it's as good as a brick.Thanks to mark "big brother" zuckerbergWho really, really values my privacy.
review_title: You know they're good for the price but BEWARE

one_reviews_text: I love my quest 2. It's a big step up from my previous headset, the Rift S. Better display, better refresh rates, and of course a wireless experience. There is also a beta feature which allows me to link tomy computer without the use of a cable for wireless PCVR experience.Deducting a star because Facebook sucks and Zuckerberg is a lizard man that's going to put us all in the matrix.

I absolutely love my oq2! It is so fun, I'm a 40 year old man but a kid at heart so I had to purchase one of these....beat saber is my favorite so far. I recommend this 1 million percent.  You will not be disappointed trust me!

We love this system! I have sight challenges and I can see,a bit easier! Just like being inside the game! No wires to mess with; easy to store! Grandsons love it! Love all the games that are available!

Decided I wanted to try vr, so I got it expecting to return it after a few hours of use, I've had it for 4-5 months now. It's a lot of fun to use, and great to entertain people with, whether you're the one using the device or watching your friend use it. It's a great price, like seriously I thought it was a joke when I first heard about it. Highly recommended, just keep in mind you will need extra cash to buy games, the free ones are not very fun. Hope this review was helpful.
This is one of the most interactive game I’ve ever played, still queasy from the roller coaster game. Worth every penny.

I bought two of the product as brand new. however, one of them ( the one as gift) arrived with an opened box and no sticker showing it's a new item. while the other one had a sticker showing it's a new item.

I have never seen or used a vr headset before. I am blown away by the graphics. I love it for the educational programs. I am not a gamer but some of them I have tried are really interesting.  Love it.

Happily we found this on the lower end of purchase costs for a gaming system theses days….but endless amounts of fun. This system is  very interactive and kids are getting in a workout with some of these game selections. My kids haven’t touched the Xbox, PlayStation or Switch since Christmas. Just the Oculus.

I like how facebook decided to price this headset at such a low cost to make it widely available to the public, and the only two things I don't like are that you need a Facebook account to be able to use it, and that the head strap that it comes with is low quality and uncomfortable, but other that that it is a good product.
Big Hit For Christmas. Bought the elite..worth it for the case and the head set.. but you will want to buy a long charger for longer play while charging..only holds a charge for about 2 hours.
Got this for my son's 18th birthday. He absolutely loves it. We shopped around and found this one cheaper than anywhere else in stores or online. Definitely recommend.

I love the oculus VR device.  It doesn't need external sensors like other vr devices so it offers more freedom.  App options are great. Directional sound is superb.  My wife bought one too so that we can play or so iur girks van play together.  I did have to ease into vr and get used to the movement as I can get motion sickness sometimes.  After a couple of weeks I've adapted and it love playing VR games now. Soorts, shooters, adventure games. They are all great to play on the oculus
The set up is a pain in the butt! It has to be connected to a a Facebook account so I connected mine. Now my son can see all my messages! Bahhhh!But hims is happy happy happy! It's pretty cool!
review_title: Obviously my 12 year old is VERY HAPPY

one_reviews_text: I bought this product 5 weeks ago, I am still not able to use it, because there's a factory bug that prevents the user to complete installation.  Meta is researching the cause and solution, and says me that they can replace it by old versions of refurbished products. I wouldn't buy until the market is sure that Meta can provide a fully working product to the customers.
This system is worth every penny! My son loves it! I highly recommend playing in an open clear room with lots of space due to running into things and knocking stuff over!

It’s a good product the only thing I didn’t like when I got it was the lens both left and right had a spot on them right in the very middle of the lens so it made everything blurry when you looked through them I don’t know why the manufacturer can’t catch that before they send them out for sale now I either have to send them back for a replace set or get a refund
We love this, but unfortunately the battery life is so slim that our family of four does not get much play time from it. It takes quite a while to charge back up as well.
review_title: Fun but battery life is short

one_reviews_text: Not super impressed with my Amazon experience. Multiple retailers had $50 gift card promo and apparently had to enter a code on Amazon to get it and I didn’t recall that requirement( nor did a ton of others based on online comments). As one who diligently uses even a 25 cent coupon this was a lot of time wasted checking for the balance.  On top of the last the device broke and replacement was easy to get but has been sitting unopened because well meh…
I bought one and now i have to buy two more... One for me and another one for my other son. We have times on when each of us can play on the one! We need more then one in this house...

The guy who brought it to my place tried to hand me a small bag when I ordered this. So make sure your driver wont try to steal your stuff too! ALSO its amazing and works well with steam Games without needing the cord
review_title: MAKE SURE YOUR DELIVERY DRIVER ACTUALLY GIVES IT TO YOU!

one_reviews_text: Now I need only to find the time to explore what to do with it other than games :)But is cool, very nice and the added mobility (aka no cables connected) is great !

The controllers always break after a few months and they don't sell replacements because they want you to buy a whole new unit.  My son is on his 3rd set of controllers in 18 months. Horrible customer support, worst I've ever experienced.

I don't leave many reviews. It takes time and effort and time is money. That being said this is easily the best gaming device I've ever purchased and/or owned. I can't believe how user friendly it is. Beat Saber alone is worth getting it for but then there's hundreds of games [apparently] and watching shows and movies, Exercising, and more. I can't wait to truly explore all it has to offer. 10/10 Do recommend 💯
review_title: The best gaming device I've ever owned

one_reviews_text: It is impressive for the first couple of hours. However, the games graphics are mediocre and there are very few games. Not worth the price and it's too early to buy.

Everything so far is ok but I took off a star because I paid for faster shipping and didn't get it any faster and when I tried to ask about a refund for that I got brought to some automated thing that didn't help at all
review_title: I paid extra for fast shipping and it wasn't any faster

one_reviews_text: I gave my grandson the Oculus Quest 2 for Christmas and he loves it! The whole family have been having a ball play and are blown away by the 3D visuals with a lot of "me next". Well done.
review_title: The whole family gets into vertual reality

one_reviews_text: Overall this has been a good product. Family has enjoyed it but After 3 months we have had tracking issues more frequently. This has caused less frequent use. We have cleaned the sensor, changed from auto to manual and back, changed other things as suggest online, but still have some issues.
I bought one of these for my son and we all loved playing it so much that I bought a second one and we now play putt putt golf and bowling games together.  The VR part is awesome.
review_title: Way more then I expected - Super Fun

one_reviews_text: Nausea and eye pain. Not safe for use. Go outside and olay
review_title: Motion sickness and EYE PAIN. Go outside and play.

one_reviews_text: So far we love everything except for the fact it is linked to a Facebook acct.  This being one of the first VR sets to set the bar, Meta did a great job.  Really looking forward to what Apple brings to the table next year!
Not a big time gamer, but so many other beautiful apps to enjoy on this Quest 2. Don't like head strap though. My Oculus Go had a comfy one this one pinches my ears. Love the VR experience.
This system can take you anywhere and is actually great for teenagers with homework… shock the hell out of me…would by again…this system beats Ps5 and others on price and performance.
review_title: Leaves other systems in the dust

one_reviews_text: I had the regular oculus quest ( which I honestly like better then the quest 2 but u can't hardly find anything for it ) I can play my games on both the quest and quest 2 which I love this is so very fun and a neat way to get exercise for yourself and your kids especially on cold or rainy days
I don’t have any issues with the item or delivery.  My order was delivered same day, but I called 3 times concerning the promotional gift card and got zero results.
review_title: Don’t count on receiving the $50 promotional e gift card

one_reviews_text: the quest 2 is amazing and worth the cost, the elite strap and official case on the other hand are not! save money and buy 3rd party for something comparable or so much better.
review_title: quest 2 is great, official accessories...not so much!

one_reviews_text: Purchased the Quest 2 and it took a little over a week to be delivered which was fantastic. The device itself is better very easy to setup and once setup is done its a breeze to use. I have had the Oculus go before this and the screen door effect has been fixed. The ability to connect to pc and play steam games is awesome. the only downside to the quest 2 is the battery life with a little over 1.5 hours of normal gameplay (not connected to the pc) could be improved.
Its all great minus the spam facebook account meta requires you to create just to use the hardware YOU payed for ass backwards to me. But hey, my unit was free of charge

The product is very heavy and leaves red marks on my face. The head strap does not fit my head very well have to wear a knit cap to make it work and feel comfortable.  The product could be made better but instead you need pay additional money and buy additional accessories to make it fit and work for you.  This problem also makes it hard to watch and use for long periods of time.

The occlusion was a big item gift that I bought for my son to give to his fiancé.  It is surprisingly good bang dor the buck.  We all enjoy it.  The downside is the dun comes at an even higher price because it is not loaded with any games on it.
I gave this to my grandson and he was so surprised and happy to get it. He spent his week of spring break enjoying the Oculus Quest. A great gift for a child.
The games are coming. Boxing one kicks butt. Nice work out doing three rounds heart rates goes up. lol No more FB account sold me. Been waiting one that for some time. YA

Item doesn’t work and Oculus customer service is horrible so far. Came with an error message that prevents it from booting up. Customer service requested a huge listed of items to send to them and now no response. Very disappointed and my son is sad not to have his Christmas present.
review_title: Doesn’t work and no customer service

one_reviews_text: I love the Oculus Quest 2. It's very fun and keeps me occupied for hours. It's so amazing. Whether you choose a game or an app, it's like you're really there.
review_title: Brings virtual reality to a higher level.

one_reviews_text: I unfortunately fall into the class of lazy equilibrium (my term).  My eyes didn't adjust well after using the VR, and i couldn't even finish a simple roller coaster ride with the dinosaurs without getting a lil dizzy.  SO BUMMED !!!  I ❣  VR !!!  Needless to say....returned and it went flawlessly

I highly recommend anyone to get a quest 2, but I would go with the 128. Games a very small and a lot of them don't have staying power, so even if you did run out of space you definitely have something to delete. Save yourself the money and go with the 128!
review_title: Quest 2 is a game changer - 256 gb not necessary

one_reviews_text: Love the Oculus 2. I was pretty suspect on this whole VR/Metaverse stuff, but I am having an absolute blast. The technology in these things are rather impressive and you really feel like you are in another world. Everyone that I have had try mine, there first reaction when they put it on is "Woahhh". I'd highly recommend getting this if you were considering it.

There are no parental controls.  The first thing that popped up on the screen was a "R" rated video.  I researched and researched trying to find some kind of parental controls.  There is NONE!!  This is something they need to fix
I bought this for my grandson's birthday. I have fun on it too! Lol! My only complaint is in my opinion they don't have enough games. At least not ones I play.
This is my first VR system and it seems pretty nice and user- friendly. There are a few demos offered, but I wish there were more to help make smart purchases.

I ordered the quest 2 thinking that I could use the $50 credit for purchasing it on accessories like grips and vr covers but they don’t tell you that it’s only for items sold and shipped by Amazon. Guess what, the only items I found from them for the quest 2 are skins and nothing useful for it. The point is the quest 2 is great but don’t get your hopes high about using that credit to further upgrade your device cause you won’t find anything useful from amazon
review_title: Oculus is great but the $50 credit is useless for it.

one_reviews_text: My 17 year old loves this.  We thought that getting his license would be the greatest part of the birthday.  However I think this VR has taken that spot.  Great battery life and very fun!
Working out. Hang play. Family friend time. Movie night. Chatting. Reading. It’s the way of the future. Expensive as heck but a great product with multiple functions and ideas

I don't have much experience with VR headsets, but very please with this. Using it for casual fun is nice. The charge on the headset is only 2hours, so an extension for the charging cable might be helpful.
review_title: Nice VR equipment. Good for casual use.

one_reviews_text: I bought 3 of these for my boys for Christmas...needless to say I am the greatest Granny ever ! They can play a game together or seperately. They are so funny to watch them play !
I was worried with mixed reviews.  I just got and I have not been able to stop.  It is so much fun for us all.  I'm so glad I bought it.  Beat Saber is my favorite so far.  LOL
I have already ordered a few extra pieces for it too. I had the Oculus Rift, but decided I didn't want to have my laptop connected to it. On Christmas I will get to try it out too.

You need a Facebook (Meta) account to use the oculus. VR is the future. There aren’t many games at this point. However, I suspect that the next few years will bring hundreds of new titles. The graphics are not photorealistic. As the technology develops the games will become I distinguishable from reality. Purchase the oculus 2 now because Facebook is offsetting the actual cost of the technology to get these into as many homes as possible. You will not be disappointed.
