Antes tenía un htc vive de los primeros que salieron, funciona bien pero siempre me dejo un gusto agridulce el hecho de que tenga que usar muchos cables y los sensores, que si o si debes tener mas espacio para que trabajen bien, pensar que ahora tengo todo eso en la oculus quest 2 e incluso es mas liviano, también tenía el problema de las gafas, tengo miopía y astigmatismo, comprar unas lentes para la htc mínimo saldría 100dolares.Cuando supe que la quest2 se podría usar con lentes, y evitar todas los cables y sensores, no lo pensé y lo compre, una vez lo tuve en mis manos, y probé, la diferencia es enorme, mejor calidad de imagen, aun siendo su pantalla lcd, puedo ver mucho mejor sin lentes incluso, para la gente que le preocupa si podrán usarlo con sus gafas, aunque no entre de primeras al visor, puedes forzarla un poco y luego entra muy bien, obviamente no lo recomiendo hacer pero no queda otra hasta que uno se Compre los lentes prescriptos para el visor, que en aliexpress me salieron 40 dolares con envío.Los mandos oculus touch, una diferencia enorme comparado con los mandosdel htc, muchos más cómodos y ergonómicos, yo juego bastante beat saber, y con los mandos del htc tenía que agarrar de una manera tosca el mando para tener mejor movilidad, las oculus touch, se adapta a cualquier situación de juego, además para mi encuentro mucho mejor que use pilas, le da más vida útil, las baterías mínimo duran 2 o 3 años y luego bajan su rendimiento.Por ultimo, recomiendo comprar la oculus quest 2 a las personas que sea su primera vez en entrar a la realidad virtusl, sin duda, el mejor lente vr de ahora,pueden jugar sin problemas la biblioteca que tiene oculus o conectar mediante usb o wireless y usar con el pc que debe cumplir con los requisitos de juego.
review_title: La mejor experiencia vr, sin cables.

one_reviews_text: There are big problems with making this VR headset work with a PC, I recommend you do a quick netsearch before purchasing.Edit: it took a couple days to wade through Oculus tech support.  The problem was on my end, obscure, and of my own creation (interesting system config over here) so I can't in good faith say this is a bad product.  The mandatory Facebook login DOES add unneeded complexity, and it will be a problem for some.  Bear in mind tech support is a touch slow but they were very thorough and patient and the headset is probably worth it.So, I award five stars for a 4.5 star headset because I was previously one star mad because of my own impatience.
review_title: Edit: the complexity of mandatory Facebook integration causes issues, but GREAT VR headset

one_reviews_text: I like this unit. I wasn't the one that did all the research for which VR to buy, that grunt work all came from my son-in-law. He did a GREAT job recommending this to us. I like the games and the experience is great (so real I discovered I get motion/car sickness). I took a star off because of the fit. No matter what I do, no matter the adjustments I try to make, the headset must sit low on my nose in order to get a perfect picture. It makes it harder to breath. They do their best for adjustments, but just still a little off.
review_title: Great system...too bad you still have to have Facebook account

one_reviews_text: After adjusting Inter Ocular Pupillary distance countless times, the View remained consistanly Blurry and with Low Resolution. After writing operating Instructions for the most simple and most complex Analog and Digital Devices as an Engineer for many years, I've concluded the Oculus 2 takes the Booby prize as the WORST INSTRUCTIONS EVER FOR BOTH THE MAIN DEVICE AND ITS CONTROLS!!!! By forcing the buyer to open a Facebook Account whether they want to or not, and purchase overpriced Content, IMHO the company will fail in both their obvious intentions of  inducting new customers into its clutches and create the obscene profits their Content demands.

First off the idea behind the oculus is awesome. It gives a cool VR experience. However, the picture clarity is just ehh. With 4K, qled, plasma TVs I would have expected more from this device especially for the price! On top of it all the games with good reviews are $30 + dollars a piece and you can’t even demo them before purchasing. The first game I purchased was onward and it was fun but because the clarity was ehh and the picture was fuzzy I kept getting dizzy and I don’t easily get motion sickness. This device is just a 360 view Wii device. I don’t believe this should cost as much or the games should be free.

So since Google killed Daydream, I migrated from the Lenovo Mirage Solo over to the Quest 2. This IS a much much better HMD, not only in the quality of games available, but the magnitude of the optics is far superior so if you are interested in viewing VR180/360 or 3D videos, this is the HMD to get ATM. The price point is great & paired with my Lenovo Mirage VR180 Camera, this is an excellent intro setup!

Works with VR on Steam, works well by itself.I'm giving three stars because they require me to have the app on my computer to play non oculus games. Then they sell me games on the computer oculus app. But none of those games you buy on the computer app can be installed on the headset. You're going to have as many as three separate and uninterchangable oculus libraries

I bought this in OR and flew with it to NC. I was so worried it would be lost or not work afterward, but it plays great!The game choices are awesome, the video quality is top notch, and the lack of wires makes all the difference.I had the PS3 VR, bit we stopped using it because you'd get tied up in the wires or rip the whole system off the tv stand. But the lack of wires was what my son was excited about the most. The system allows you to draw a play area so you don't walk off a cliff or down the stairs, perfect for kiddos.We will probably get another.
review_title: Works well and has probably traveled more than you

one_reviews_text: Love this VR. I have owned the PSVR for years and this blows it away. It’s comfortable the wear and not too heavy. I love not being attacked by a cord to a console. The graphics are amazing. I love the ability to draw your play area and also switch between standing and sitting depending on what you are playing. Games can be a little expensive but you get what you pay for. Wish I would have bought this sooner.

I am a senior woman so not killing zombies, but tons of adventure non the less.  I love the fitness program Supernatural, the travel program Wander seen so many beautiful areas can not afford to go to. Love the games moss and other escape room types and the social areas. Also love mini golf and the table tennis. Love the movie watching of my Amazon movies in the VR theater.  Tons of fun. Anxious to start exploring the new updates with office too. I bought cute accessories for mine here on Amazon of skin, purple and head piece made it mine but it also protects it from finger oils and more comfy.
review_title: 💘 Love Love Love this and a 59 year old lol

one_reviews_text: Got this for work, since we work remotely. We use it for virtual meetings using horizon workrooms, and it's great. So thought I'd try out some games, and it's been fun ever since. Fun, fun, fun.

By far the Quest 2 is the best overall VR headset and it's popularity on Steam proves it. There may be other HMD's that do one thing better but nothing on the market right now does everything as well as the Quest 2 does, plus it's entirely wireless. You can use it as a standalone wireless VR headset and have a blast. Or you can connect it to a PC and play PC VR games with better resolution. it will take a few accessories to unlock it's full potential (like a new headstrap and a link cable) but nothing is more versatile.HOWEVER and this needs to be said. it requires a Facebook account to function. Some people will find that to be a deal breaker.
review_title: The best overall VR headset,  with a caveat

one_reviews_text: My 8yo son saved up his money to buy this and loves it.  There's a couple down sides from a mom standpoint.  He can't see when he's wearing it and is hitting walls, oven, baby brother etc. No matter what room we put him in he's running into stuff.  It could be that he's overly active while playing it.  Also, he's allergic to something on the headset itself that touches the face so the majority of his face is broke out in a rash. We put the silicon cover on it to protect his face and it doesn't fit very well,almost like it was stretched out  Otherwise he loves it. For the price it would be great to get some kind of basic carrying case for it as well.

I'm a console gamer. VR gaming won't ever change that, but I do quite enjoy 'exploring' in VR,  whether it's games like Myst (I still have my Sega Saturn version from 1995 though), or tours of VR cities/environments. I adapted to VR pretty quickly; I haven't experienced motion sickness, and my eyes don't feel strained after playing for a prolonged period of time. I'm disappointed there are only 3 "locked in" settings for the lens width though, as odds are one of the three are "close" to what you need, instead of being exactly what you need (per your IPD).
review_title: VR isn't for everyone, but it's fun.

one_reviews_text: My son saved up to get him a VR set for gaming, he’s 14… We bought this, because apparently he didn’t do enough research to realize it does not work for PlayStation’s. Other than that looks really awesome, the packaging was amazing, they lost the first one, immediately gave us a refund, sent the next one out. We sent it back once we discovered that it does not work for the PlayStation and they gave us a refund.

Got this for the family to play. Easy to set up and had a few free options to get started. The head strap stinks, first thing I’m getting is a better one. Also got some grips coming. But the game play itself was super fun for ages 5,9,11,12,19,41,55. The controllers are to big for my 5 year old to hold and press the buttons at the same time so hopefully the grips will help, but everyone else took right to it.

This console is amazing. Very comfortable to put on. (It is very adjustable to fit you head. Controllers are comfortable in hand. You will be hooked on this from the moment you start. I myself have been playing vrchat on here almost every night since I got it.*Please note that battery life is the only thing that a pain on this thing sometimes. But on the same token, it charges up relatively quick and can even be used while charging though what you can do will be sligh limited because of charging cable is not super long.

Just the free apps already provide an immense amount of content to explore and experience.  Be careful as you get started as maintaining balance can sometimes be an issue (especially when first experiencing Jurassic park movies). Make sure to read the instructions about nausea, my only experience with is was when I got the walking dead, but there are work-around, and you can get used to it.

Finally VR is available at an acceptable price for me. This VR headset is truly a versatile device.  From playing games to watching moves and even educational experiences, I've used this every day and I'm enjoying it immensely.  I'm getting more exercise than I have in a long while since many of the games require vigorous movement to play them well.  I suggest getting some accessories to improve comfort and durability including the following:  A pad for the headband, silicone grip covers, and blue light filtering lens covers.  My first one had a defective controller so I returned it for a replacement. Still it gets 5 stars for the awesomeness.

This is a great vr system to get if you don’t wanna spend 800 plus for the high end vr systems. It does everything it more expensive competition does at a fraction of the cost. You can play it’s games wireless or hook it up to your pc to play the more demanding vr games. Battery life is ok but would recommend purchasing a battery with it. This is the Swiss Army knife of vr systems. They also allow you to share game purchases with other quests in your household. Overall love it only draw back is battery life is about 2hours.
review_title: Great all round entry level vr

one_reviews_text: Omg. How did I ever do life without this system. I literally use it everyday. The exercise games are so fun that I forget I'm actually burning calories. The meditation apps are so wonderful. I really can't say enough.  It was worth EVERY penny!

Once you put all of the upgrades onto the Quest 1 it is pretty heavy. Using similar upgrades (headband, facial vent, plastic cover) the Quest 2 still feels significantly lighter than the Quest 1.In the Oculus app on PC you can unlock the highest res and use that for computer games and steam. Using that res compared to the stock res on the Quest is an incredible difference.If you are familiar with the Quest - moving to the Quest 2 controllers instantly feels "right". The button placement is much better
review_title: Feels like half the weight of the Quest 1

one_reviews_text: Best game console out. This is the future. Lots of free games also.

I was worried about how long my kids would stay interested in this because no matter what I buy they always go back to the consoles but this has been a hit. Someone in our family plays it everyday including the adults. I really wish it had more games but Beat Saber is my favorite and my youngest loves Echo. I highly recommend this. It's absolutely worth the price. I would buy a more comfortable head strap and rubber face mask though because the ones it comes with aren't incredibly comfortable after a while.

Must admit I was very apprehensive to buy this and made sure it had the free return possibility. That said, I am happy with the purchase and must admit a bit amazed. I have never really spent much time with video games simply as I just didn't personally find them interesting. There is much more to enjoy with the Oculus product and indeed I have found a couple of interesting games as well. The immersive video is great and being able to link to street view in the Wander app is fascinating.I agree with many of the points in reviews that found critical elements. The straps are definitely a bit cumbersome and I really have some second thoughts about any link to facebook as indeed is required here. I am sure there is more than meets the eye (VR or otherwise) with the facebook connection.All in all I am happy with the purchase and glad I bought the unit. They have kept the price good for what I think you get and there seems a decent variety of experiences available with the unit.
review_title: For someone who is a gamer or not

one_reviews_text: BUY THIS IF U LOVE PLAYING SHOOTING GAMES! CAN WATCH NETFLIX AND YT, JUST A BIT UNCOMFORTABLE WHEN U WEAR UR GLASSES

My son wanted this for Christmas. I was not gonna spend this kind of money on a single present and said no. Then had the opportunity to play one of his friends. When I say this thing will blow your mind, that is an understatement. The quality and versatility of this computer is amazing. you feel like you are actually inside the game. If you order one, download a 3d video. You can be hovering 10,000ft above the ground or swimming through the ocean with the fish. You won't be disappointed.
review_title: Holy crap this thing is amazing

one_reviews_text: I bought this for my kid and had no idea what they were to start. After checking them out we are all pretty wowed. I am unable to use them for more than 20 minutes before I need to stop due to motion sickness. I get hit hard by it and need to lie down to get rid of it. My kid can go all day no issues. However the bulkiness Hurts her face due to how small her head is and finding the right fit.with all that out of the way I'm absolutely amazed at how far virtual reality has come for near full immersion.

I have to say that I have used VR before this in VR arcades, but it is truly a different experience when you have it yourself.1. It was comfortable, the silicone rubber and the faux leather material are very nice, it does get irritating after 40~ mins. The weight is minimal compared to the Valve Index and HTC Vive so that is very nice, and no, wires!2. The strap, sometimes uncomfortable after a little while but it offers just enough support for me not to go out right away and buy a different strap. The adjustment on the back is very annoying but I got used to it, top adjustment is very nice. I might buy a third party strap like the bobovr one3. The graphics were amazing, I could barely see any pixels and the resolution and 120 Hz is very nice, my only problem with it is how my perephial vision is excessively blurry, there is not enough persice lense adjustment for the diverse human species. Overall very nice but not flawless4. Audio, nothing much to say, standard surround sound, crisp audio without that much bass. About the same if not a bit better than internal TV speakers.5. Controls were easy to use after learning how to use them for 30 minutes, nothing else to say6. There were a few good free games on the store, many of the nice beta games are not listed unless you search specifically for them. A lot of the good games are over 20$ which for some of the games I might say is a bit overpriced, like Population One, which I don't think qualifies as a game worth 25$, more like >207. In conclusion this VR headset competes with other headsets verywell, expecially in the price to performance area, wish it had better cooling and whatnot, but overall it was very great. My PC only runs on a 1050 Ti so I could not run Air Link stably. Hope to be able to buy more games on the Quest 2 (Lookin at you Oculus)
review_title: My first personal VR headset, an 8.5 outta 10. Impressive 👍

one_reviews_text: I purchased the OQ2 256 GB after I tried out my son-in Laws at Christmas so I ordered one...Really pretty decent graphic on the 2 golf games and the bowling I bought was a little better......  but can always use improvement. You can be active in VR  and move around in your space,...you can sit or stand. There are many reasonable priced games and videos to suit your taste. I'm enjoying the interactive regular golf and putt putt golf and The bowling and also many VR videos where the quality is much better. I think everyone one would enjoy this VR set.....it's a lot of fun and has something for the whole family
review_title: Oculus Quest 2 — Advanced All-In-One Virtual Reality Headset — 256 GB....so much Fun!!!

one_reviews_text: I've been wanting a vr set for YEARS, and I finally saved up enough money to buy myself one! The price is soooo worth it. It was extremely easy to setup! Pretty comfortable once you get use to it! The headset only option came with the headset (of course), two controllers, a charger, and a few things to put around the headset to make it more comfortable for people with glasses! I've been having so much fun with this and I can't wait to stream with it!

My son asked for the Oculus quest 2 for his birthday. He was so excited to receive it and was able to set it up himself. With a couple of downloads to his android phone and a wifi connection (batteries were included for controllees) he was off and has been playing it a bit every day for 2 weeks.

Amazing piece of technology. Software is incredible. Experience of virtual reality is incredible. The problem is they went really cheap the hardware. The eye strain is serious for me. The battery dies in less than an hour and it dont have OLED display. If they would increase the pixels eye strain would be less. You pretty much have to play with it plugged into outlet because the battery is like 300mah.
review_title: Amazing piece of technology. Needs OLED display. Eye Strain would be less

one_reviews_text: I'm not qualified to provide technical advice, but I do know what is "FUN."  This is the perfect product for numerous uses.  Read other reviews to get details, but suffice it to say that this is fun for all ages and does NOT require wiring or a computer to use.  Given the demand for it, you won't find discounts, so the Amazon price is as good as you are going to get at this time.  Enjoy!

I prefer you get the headband with it because if it isn’t aligned with ur eyes perfectly it’s gonna be a bit blurry. Most of the games are from 10-30 dollars so if u planned on buying it then have a few hundred dollars to spare. Other then that it’s a pretty good console

Neat somewhat immersive gadget with an easy interface.  And makes for some funny videos if you take them of the person while they are playing!  Lots of odd dancing around and dodging and generally goofy behavior. Best of all my surly teenager is not being surly, but is instead in the basement not sulking about perceived slights and NOT just sitting on his can playing minecraft!
review_title: Cool gadget and I haven't heard my son in several hours.

one_reviews_text: This is amazing! I’m 43 yrs old and currently have an oculus quest on the way for myself because it is really cool. There’s tons of free games, and watching Netflix feels like you’re in a movie theater. I love watching YouTube videos as well and you can choose the screen size which the large size goes from your left alllll the way to your right, like it’s curved. Pretty sure I’m going to get 1 for everyone in the family so we can play games together! This is definitely a futuristic type thing and I’m glad to be alive to enjoy it!
review_title: I bought 2 for my kids and ended up wanting one!

one_reviews_text: It is a very fun console to play with until I get motion sickness from it. I played for about 30min and was dizzy for 4, 5hours.. I sincerely hope they can fix this problem. Furthermore, I ware glasses and this thing is NOT glass friendly at all. It needs a bigger enclosure for us with glasses so that it is not painful to wear.
review_title: Fun while it last before you get motion sickness

one_reviews_text: Cool headset, does not come with games but you can download a few free games.
review_title: Saved up his money to buy this himself

one_reviews_text: I love my Oculus Quest  2. I have had it for a while now and it is fun to play. I am sad that you have to have a facebook account to use it, and I had to reactivate my account for it, but otherwise, it is a great VR experience. The games that I have played are very good, the graphics are top notch so far and I would recommend this!

I have received my VR, a lot of games, there are a lot of games that I don’t know how to play and I can play slowly, I really like this baby, I love it so much, I don’t have to go outside to play anymore. Playing outside is expensive. Why not buy one yourself and play with it? It’s also good to watch a movie when you’re tired. The service is very good.
This thing is amazing, I was going back and forth for months trying to decide. I'm sooo glad I did. It's so much fun and you don't realize until you stop playing that you've basically had a workout.
review_title: You'll get a work out and have fun doing it.

one_reviews_text: Cool product. Was looking for something a retired 59 year old could get into. With the view pack, the fit was better. Just couldnt see and had weird headaches after less than an hour. Meta makes their money on the apps. FYI… buy the apps in the headset, not the phone app. No return policy if you buy in the app.

Love the Oculus 2 set.  It is so much fun to use with family, friends and at parties.  Games are inexpensive compared to similar products.  Hours of fun. Only knock is I have had trouble casting to my TV.
review_title: What a Blast for the Whole Family!

one_reviews_text: My Son keeps thanking me for this gift and we’re two weeks after I gave it to him! He’s on it every day and plays with one of his friends remotely (who also has one). I want to try it but I have to buy the adapter thingy for ppl who wear glasses (or get contacts). My Son has had loads of fun!

A great and cheap alternative to HTC Vive etc. It has a good resolution and performs well. The build quality is much lower than competition (head strap, controllers especially feel cheap), but so is the price, so it's ok for me. I've been mostly using it with the Air  Link to stream from my PC, so I can't speak much on how it runs as stand-alone unit.
Facebook does it again.  Their support sucks on facebook and it sucks on occulus.  I would avoid until they get it right.
review_title: Worst account set up experience ever.

one_reviews_text: The best form of entertainment I have ever seen. The walk about mini golf is a superior game and playing with family miles away is great. I recommend this product very highly.
I've had the Gear vr and Psvr.  This is the first vr system I've had that feels like a finished product.  Single usb connection to your pc for pc vr is incredible!
review_title: Resisted due to facebook privacy issues but it's amazing.

one_reviews_text: Had a lot of fun using this and trying out a handful of VR games. Compared to other $1000 this was the only one I could really afford. At times I wish the fidelity was better but it's more likely not ideal because I wear glasses and wear it awkwardly. If angled correctly everything looks great, although to do so is a bit annoying. Overall, for $300 it's a damn good headset
Definitely worth the price, had my mom doubt it but once she tried it she loved it, now she won’t stop using it. Definitely amazing to play games in a different form.

The biggest feature is that it is convenient, with only one helmet and two handles, which contains all the functions! The 4k visual effects are real, and the sound quality is very stereoscopic. It is worthy of being the best VR device. I look forward to the game from my brother, otherwise it will not be enough to play.
review_title: The biggest feature is that it is convenient,

one_reviews_text: I've been wanting VR for a long time, and having used the amazing Index, it gave me an inch that not having VR couldn't scratch. For the price, this is an amazing alternative to more expensive VR setups. The Inside out tracking is perfect for making do with whatever space you have.
First time VR user and was amazed by the experience!Easy to setup, and easy to use.Improving strap would’ve been nicer, but there are many 3rd party accessories to close that gap.

My first headset, and it's great because you don't need anything else! Unfortunately it is from Facebook so you do need to make an account. If you have a capable PC, don't but games from the Oculus store! Just get virtual desktop from the store, and buy your games on PC so you can play them on your next headset and you don't give Facebook anymore of your financial information.

Works great standalone or with oculus link. Selection of games is small but expanding rapidly, with most VR classics able to run standalone. The elite strap and a power bank are a must have, you can play comfortably for hours and not worry about battery life at all.
review_title: Very comfortable with the elite strap

one_reviews_text: I am a graduate student and I like to be as productive as possible whenever studying. I found myself with some time and decided to try the oculus to bump up my productivity. I used the immersed app and it was decent, I was very surprised at first how you can connect your computer to it. I tried it for a study session of 1 hr (after setting everything up the night before. It’s just not there yet guys, the words are hard to see, it’s not a pleasant experience trying to type and the Vr is just too bulky for having it a long time. I also tried some games and it was really nice for that, but not for work.  I’ll buy the next one and try again. Hope this helps. (Also battery life is not that good)
review_title: Not there yet (for work at least)

one_reviews_text: Bought this for a birthday present for my 11-year-old, and quickly things turned from excitement to frustration, as I was not able to connect it to my PayPal account in order to purchase games, partly due to a confusing registration process for someone like me that doesn't have a Facebook account. Issue was eventually resolved, but I find the whole process way too complicated. BTW, the technology is a lot of fun!
review_title: After initial headaches with set-up, now works great

one_reviews_text: My favorite part about this item, is that I can control it from my phone. So when my daughter plays it, I can see who's talking to her during the games, control how long she can play on it, and what games get downloaded on it, and what can be purchased.We love the new experiences on it and I have been using some of the workout games on there. It has been really nice to think I'm outside, when it's been actually -5 out.Highly recommend it to others!

I held off buying a VR set for a very long time. My friends finally convinced me, and I'm not disappointed. Make sure to look at some accessories, like an external battery and some controller covers. They aren't necessary, but they'll easily increase your enjoyment.

This arrived extremely fast. Was definitely brand new unopened in the box. This has already brought hours of family fun and exercised to my house. I am not a big fan of gaming but this system I believe is a must-have for all families so fun and active.

I hesitated at first because but I am amazed and happy that I bought this. The video quality is awesome, apps are great and I know there will be more coming even though I haven’t finished exploring what I already have. Like the workouts, music, tv and everything!!!! A must have

Product received when promised, arrived packaged very nice and protected for shipment!  My whole family is having so much fun with the Oculus Quest 2!  Everyone wants to use it and cannot wait until it's their turn!  I look forward to exploring all of the activities you can do in virtual reality!
review_title: Tons of fun in virtual reality!

one_reviews_text: I've wanted a VR for a long time, and when I saw the price of the Quest 2 I was a little skeptical that it wouldn't be able to run my wishlist Steam games. After setting it up and logging in through Facebook (which I was also pretty nervous about), Oculus Link AND Airlink worked flawlessly for me, and I was playing Beat Saber within an hour. Very happy with this purchase!My only complaint is the price of the official cable, $79 is ridiculous. I ended up buying a Type A to Type C cable for less than half the price that works perfectly with Oculus Link.
review_title: The best cheap option for SteamVR!

one_reviews_text: In order to set this POS up, you have to “permanently merge” it to a “single” Facebook account.So now I have to have Oculus and who knows who else monitoring my Facebook account!WTH Oculus!!!!
review_title: If ONLY I knew before I purchased!!!

one_reviews_text: This makes me feel sick BUT certain games are tolerable and everyone else in the family enjoys it. For the price it should come with a case or a stand for storage when not playing the box just never seems to close the same. All in all good product
I love this VR not only play games. I can also watch movies on Netflix, Amazon prime, YouTube and more.

Got a quest 2 as my first virtual reality headset and  I am blown away every time I use it. It's easy to set up and Intuitive and they walk you through the first time and it's mind blowing if you have only played on a tv HIGHLY RECOMMEND
I was excited  to get the item, but it was so fuzzy that when I look inside the headset I couldn't see the words, also it made so very dizzy. I tried to adjust the lens but still couldn't see.
I wish it had additional tracking cameras for behind but it works great otherwise. 10/10 would recommend.
The kids and I are enjoying this.  It is a lot of fun so far.  The only down side is having to readjust it for each person that uses it.

My grandson loves it! I surprised him for Christmas. He was shocked I bought it for him! But he’s worth it! I played it for the first time and it was really cool! Thank you Amazon for selling amazing items at a good price!✔️

This thing is fun. I purchased two for my two kids and they love it. I've even been using it late at night to kill time. Plenty of games for whatever your taste is. I limit my kids usage time to 1 hour per day as I do worry about the screens being 2 inches from their eyes. Quality is great, feels solid and screen rate looks good. I cant wait to see what future models have
Too complicated to set it up! They want your money before they show what they offer, you stack in a room that you can't do anything, no exit, nothing. Super infancy this day and age.
review_title: SUPER INFANCY - NOT IMPRESSED WITH WHAT IT DOES AND OFFERS. WILL RETURN

one_reviews_text: What a "tripie" experience. I bought this for my hubs for Christmas, but I think I've been playing with it just as much.Definitely alot of fun and a better experience than the regular old video games. Highly recommend.

Kids, adults, seniors... it just works. A few hiccups here and there, but pretty darn simple and impressive otherwise. I've been playing some boxing games and I'm dripping with sweat afterwards.  Great workout.
review_title: I hated the return on effort for using VR until I tried these

one_reviews_text: You have to sign up to Facebook to use this because they want to track you and your usage. Unless you’re willing to pay an additional 500.00 to get the stand alone model.But 3D effects are great

Very Surreal.  I been using my Oculus2 the past 48 hrs and Im blown away.  Between youtubeVR, Resident Evil4 and the VR world, I am super impressed. 300$ is a great price for a great, unique experience.
It was a gift to my teen. Immersive but very clunky. I might consider getting one for myself when they come up with a weightless or a very light VR set.

This set has brought countless hours of fun to our home. We laugh and laugh. Truly incredible what technology has done. The Oculus Quest 2 is amazing and I recommend to everyone who comes over. So much fun.

Never thought about ordering one of these. Visited with my daughter who had one. She wanted me to try it. It was awesome. Ended up buying two. One for me and one for the wife. Fantastic technology and allot of fun. Wish there were more apps to choose from. Great product.
Froze/glitches a lot, flimsy controllers, not light weight as advertised, didn't come with the charger.I'd recommend you pass on this one.
Unbelievable graphics very easy navigation on negative would be pricey apps and games but another positive note is you can hook it up to your computer if it capable of handling the occulus
Ive used the oculus before buying. It's very fun to use so I knew I had to get one. No problems with shipping nor any damages when it arrived.

 This has helped me out with my family and entertainment when we are stuck at home and able to laugh at these memories

I used to hate working out; I used to hate meditating. Now I look forward to both. Apps in 360 make these things fun. Plus you can watch your tv shows on a "big screen". Easily the best purchase I've made in years. I plan to buy these for my entire family.
review_title: Blown away- this is the future

one_reviews_text: it will not work without a Facebook account though i already have account on Oculus
review_title: it will not work without a Facebook account though i already have account on Oculus

one_reviews_text: I just downloaded one of the boxing games and the fun and enjoyment and laughter we had with the hole family was worth buying it for.  Truly an incredible device.
My niece, who this was a gift for, absolutely loves it. I’m not going to lie, I think I have been having equally as much fun with it!!! Hours of enjoyment so far!!
I've had original PSVR, Lenovo Explorer, HP G2, Wireless Vive Pro, and now the Quest 2. The Quest 2 is insanely cool for the price.
This thing is amazing and so much fun. Only problem I have is the way it sits on my face. Very awkward and can be frustrating. But for the most part it is loads of fun.
Arrived earlier than expected date to kuwait and  nicelypackeged and worked great. Oculus quest 2 👍🏻
review_title: Delivered early to kuwait and worked great

one_reviews_text: I use it for Beat Saber to exercise. I bought it for my son. I wish I could afford to buy another one for myself!! What a great “toy”!
Wow! Fast shipment and excellent product! My child so far loves it and so do I! Careful packaging, honestly! Above and beyond thank you!
Honestly I wish we didn't love this sooooo much! What a terrific gift/device for ALL ages. High quality, sturdy, and legit experience(s) all around.
Bought this as a Christmas gift for my now 13 year old. He uses it every day. I love that he can be so active with some of the games.
The whole family is enjoying thus product. Can't say enough good things,  recommend the highest gig memory so you never have to worry about space. There is no way to add gigs after you buy it.
I loved it, I bought it for Christmas present for my husband and some stores did not have it so ordered it and received it pretty fast and same price they have it at the stores.
So far im enjoying this new world, I love the fishing game and the shooting game , I’m getting brave to try the flight simulator
Best VR on the market today.

I had never experienced VR before buying this but I have to say, it is amazing! There are so many things to do from mini golf to learning how to box. If you're looking for a fun way to exercise, this is it. I do advise the use of blue light glasses, using a vr headset is kind of like sticking your eyeballs against a tv screen.
review_title: Completely out of this world experience!

one_reviews_text: I am not a gamer, but bought it to do the Supernatural Fitness app, which I love to pieces.  No problems at all with the Oculus it'self.
Everyone should buy one of these.  It's amazing!  In the photo you can see my headset with the Oculus Quest 2 Elite head strap on the Anker Charging dock.
Too much fun for just one, if you have several kids or grandkids or still a kid yourself LOL...you'll need more then one if you don't like to share.

We loved this item up until it quit working shortly after using it. Now, when you put the headset on, all you see is a green infinity symbol on a black screen, and when I researched why this might happen, it said that it was being updated but froze the account. I CANT GET IT PAST THE UPDATE. SO, we have not been able to use it now for over a month.!!!! 🤬🤬🤬
This is the most amazing future tech I’ve gotten my hands on and I’m already addicted!!!! There isn’t anything else like it out there !!!!!
great gaming platform
Worth every penny.  Kids love it and ius adults also enjoy relaxation voyages all over the world.  Recommend to own one

If you don't have games for the oculus pre-ordered, don't worry, you can buy games off of the oculus! Its so Hyper realistic! If you get motion sick easily then be careful. But this works like a charm!
An impressive amount of functionality for $300. I ended up buying a 3rd party case and an elite strap (so I could more easily share with wife)
No issues to report, it works fine and is really addicting. A virtual desktop in the comfort of your bed or couch is pretty worthwhile.
Things are awesome, and you enter a new world as soon as you bring them together. The experience is great, but you need to study various functions carefully.
review_title: you need to study various functions carefully.

one_reviews_text: I loved my PSVR but I have to admit that Oculus hit the nail on the head with their introduction and their home screen. Plus being untethered with the guardian system allows for a more immersive experience.
review_title: A much better experience than the PSVR

one_reviews_text: our kids loved thiswas just alittle hard to set up at first but once you get the hang of it not bad at all
Wow - the kids love this --- Oculus / Facebook / et al has scored with this game system. We got 2 of them.

Love the VR and we already have a 256b but the amazon driver is confused on where a backdoor is. He walked right into my front door into my living room and handed me the package. Young kid nice enough but might need to learn front and back
review_title: Excellent VR but amazon drivers are confused on Details

one_reviews_text: They have doubled the memory on the base model to 128GB and priced it at $299. Great deal for a very fun VR system! Don’t miss out, get your Christmas shopping done now before it’s gone again. Refuse to pay double and triple the price to scalpers. Glad it’s back in stock at Amazon.
review_title: Great deal through Amazon. Don’t buy from scalpers!

one_reviews_text: My family and I love this product!!! Came a day later than what was said, but just glad we got it! So happy with it!! Just as described in the description!!
You will not regret buying this, I love it and so does the family. I even connect it to my pc to play pcvr games, best budget vor out there, no wires and great quality.

Didn't know what to expect trying one of this products!  Found out it's great and love it!
This is awesome. Graphics are impressive, easy to use, but you have to have a Facebook account to access it.
My son loves this. Totally cool vr experience. He likes it so well my other son ran out and got one.
It’s fun for the whole family! Just make sure you have room around you so no one gets hit lol

Got for my daughter (8) and niece (9). They LOVE IT. I used it a few times and it is awesome.
my son and i are very happy with the performace and options of games and apps. we will be getting another at some point to be able to play together.
This thing will keep you busy for a while. Graphics are decent and transitions are smooth.

one_reviews_text: Talk about feeling totally in a new world. The oculus quest 2 is absolutely amazing and every one I have had try it , loves it. Old or young fun for all ages.

ig got it for my 13 year old son great gift

I would wait awhile and save your money for three reasons.1.) Wait for the tech to improve. Initially the Oculus 2 is very impressive but the fun wears off quickly. The unit itself (without looking up specs) seems to be not much more powerful than a cellphone. Wait for a more powerful unit.2.) Wait for app developers to catch up. Some apps are fun for an hour or three but there really isn’t that many fun, well-developed games available yet. It’s mostly walking around an environment and graphics are about equal to an Xbox 360. Besides “watching 360 videos……….” there really aren’t many fun games so wait for developers to make some more content for the platform.3.) Tech support is very disappointing. The comfort of the head strap that comes with it not very good. So I paid close to $100 for Oculus’s Quest 2 Elite Strap. That strap is a much better design but made of a bad plastic concoction that is brittle and many people (view the listing) are having their straps break, including me. It didn’t last a year and I’m a grown man, I take very good care of the unit (I keep it in a padded gun case) and I don’t use it very often. I currently have 13 emails with tech support about it and still don’t have a head strap replacement. They ask for a LOT of information on the support ticket (I.e. pics, serial number, proof of purchase) and if you have a life and don’t respond almost immediately they try to close the ticket. It’s been 13 emails and 20 days and I still haven’t even gotten an “OK we’ll send you a new one”. For a company that should be big enough, they don’t have it together very well.Hopefully in the future this will change. It’s a cool idea but it’s just not there yet and in my opinion after a year with it, it wasn’t worth the money. Not by a long shot.

I'll start with why I 2 starred this, aka CHECK YOUR IPD BEFORE YOU BUY:The terrible: The IPD, (Inter-pupillary distance for those uninitiated) is the distance between your two eyes. The quest 1, valve index, and even mobile VR headsets like gear VR figured out, we're all a little different and need a minute adjustment.Quest 2? Three general, these will probably work for most of you slider settings. If you are dead in between those adjustments, they will not work and you will be met with severe pain in your eyes after 20-30 minutes of gaming. CHECK YOUR IPD BEFORE YOU BUY. My IPD is just over 65, which means I'm dead center between the 2-3 settings and get severe headaches. There needs to be a warning label on the damn thing about this, and there is not.The positive?: This is excellent quality for a budget headset. It's one panel, like a mobile VR headset, but it feels pretty good, even the default strap is pretty comfy. Oculus already had a good set of titles when FB/Meta bought them so you can play good games even if the newer ones that FB/Meta is making are crappy cash grabs in most cases.The bad: It feels cheap, the cameras detrack if you swing your arm too wide, or you look left and reach right like when playing beatsaber. It could be better, but for the price a little bit of learning to tilt head toward wide arm reaches, really isn't terrible.

There was no such option as 128 GB when I was preordering it. And a year later, this guys release 128GB version for same $299!I feel like I was scammed.Also the OS is extremely buggy, like I'm using nightly built beta releases.Guardian is kinda annoying. Too distracting.

one_reviews_text: This is a super fun and amazing gaming device. The only complaint I have is it lost my controller tracking for one second once. Never had that problem ever again.

Honestly I'm a pretty experienced VR user, I've had a desktop HMD for a few years now. I thought it'd be silly to buy a standalone since PC tethered VR is supposed to be so much better. However I bought this on a whim this Black Friday and it's incredible1) No cable tripping you up, it sounds incredibly minor but not having a cable that you can feel getting caught on your back or your feet really helps you feel more immersed.2) Home Theater anywhere- the Quest 2 has a crisp enough display that you can lay in your bed with an gigantic virtual screen directly infront of you, I use it to watch incredibly dumb youtube videos in a cinematic environment.3) You can tether it to your PC via WiFi, meaning that you can play PC exclusive games like Half Life: Alyx, or even games that are on the quest but on the PC at a higher resolution. You literally get the best of both worlds, no cable in the way with a high frame rate and  fantastic visual fidelity.Overall,  this headset is incredible for beginners, you can strap this on anyone's head and they'll have fun, but even if you already have a Vive or a Samsung Odyssey, this is a crazy good upgrade.
review_title: Good allround entertainment device, best in price class HMD

El visor es muy bueno para lo que cuesta. El precio real debería rondar entre 6000-6200 pesos. Sin embargo, para ser un precio mexicano se me hace entendible por la tarifa de importación.Ahora sí viene lo bueno: La experiencia. Es un visor de realidad virtual que demuestra calidad desde el unboxing, tal vez lo único criticable desde mi perspectiva sería la banda de la cabeza, pero se entiende totalmente porque oculus vende la correa elite por separado. La banda de cabeza no es incómoda, simplemente no va de acuerdo a la calidad percibida del producto en general, simplemente si puedes comprar la elite o una genérica, entonces sería lo mejor que puedes hacer.La experiencia de juegos es simplemente irreal, sumamente inmersivo y si le sumas el hecho de que puedes vincularla directamente a tu pc entonces se vuelve un game changer (si tienes una computadora que pueda correr los juegos). No considero necesario usarlo con un PCVR, pero se agradece demasiado poder hacerlo con un router casero con apenas 3-8 ms de latencia desde una habitación diferente conectado a la red de 2.5ghz. Si quieres desconectarte un par de horas del mundo (porque eso es lo que en promedio dura su batería) y pasar un buen rato, esta es la opción a tomar. Respecto a la batería, aunque pueda parecer algo escasa, es suficiente si tomamos en cuenta la necesidad de descansar los ojos, de todos modos si requieres más tiempo puedes conectarte directamente al pc adquiriendo cualquier cable usb 3.2 a usb c o a un powerbank de diversas capacidades para alargar tus sesiones de VR.Si esperas una calidad visual cercana a la que tenemos en el mundo real, entonces te recomiendo que inviertas en visores del doble o triple de precio, pero por este precio considero competente la percepción de los objetos renderizados por el visor por sí mismo y vía PC es sobresaliente, pero con puntos a destacar como lo son el texto que por lo que entiendo en casi cualquier visor de uso no profesional suelen notarse algo borrososos en algunos ángulos de visión, pero es cuestión de explorar y encontrar los puntos de enfoque de la visión para poder leer sin mayor esfuerzo texto en esta plataforma. Satisfecho 100% con esta compra.Edit: Desafortunadamente a la semana y media de uso murieron un par de pixeles justo en el centro, por lo que opté por devolverlo para posteriormente pedir otro que no tenga este defecto, así que por esto cambio mi calificación de 5 a 4 estrellas.
review_title: Precio bueno para ser México y experiencia de 10

 No me quedaba claro lo que había que hacer con él, ya en mis manos, pues tuve que aprender y decidí no gastar en el cable oficial que cuesta casi un 20% de lo que vale el aparato, invertí en un Router 6g, que instalé como en 15 minutos con todo y configuración.  Ahora puedo jugar lo que he comprado desde mi computadora en cualquier parte de la casa, sin cables, excepto el de la batería extra.  La tienda Oficial Oculus tiene costos de casi el doble, así que hago una wishlist en Steam y conforme me van avisando que están en descuento, lo voy aprovechando.Hay que hacer gastos extras si eres jugador de hueso colorado, como yo.  Hay que invertir en una correa que balancee el peso del equipo, también que tenga para sostener una batería extra porque a mí no me alcanza el tiempo que da la batería inicial.  También voy a invertir en una careta y en unos lentes anti luz azul y antirreflejantes.Lo que debo decir... Es que absolutamente vale la inversión, la Realidad Virtual tiene una cantidad de Experiencias Immersivas que no sabrás por dónde empezar y qué probar después.Pero absolutamente vale cada centavo.  Me arrepiento de dudar entre comprar éste o el PS5 por tanto tiempo.  Aquí no nado en dinero, así que la duda estaba justificada.
review_title: Mucho tiempo dudando entre PS5 y Oculus Quest 2 en vano...

one_reviews_text: Primeramente, el visor es de lo mejor qué hay en el mercado CONSIDERANDO el precio; un valve index es MUY caro, pero tiene adiciones qué el Quest 2 no y viceversa; eso es lo que lo hace un gran visor a comparación de los de tope de gama.Si tienes planeado usarlo para jugar en tu computadora:1) Necesitas una GPU y CPU capaces de correr realidad virtual.2) Requieres de un cable adicional cómo el Oculus Link, SIN EMBARGO, existen cables genéricos cómo alternativas, que son mejores, y más largos.2.1) Si vas a comprar un cable genérico, asegurate de qué sea:USB-C 3.1 a USB-C 3.1 ó USB-A 3.1 a USB C; estos cables rondan entre los 490-780 pesos mexicanos por el simple hecho de ser 3.1, ES OBLIGATORIO que sean 3.1 y no 2.0, porque de lo contrario vas a gastar de más al darte cuenta que vas a tener un rendimiento pobre, no gastes 200 o 300 mxn para después gastar otros 500 mxn.3) Una nueva correa o headstrap; sí, las reseñas eran ciertas; el headstrap o correa que viene por defecto es un dolor de cabeza (literalmente) es un mal diseño ya que no distribuye de forma homogénea el peso del viso sobre tu cabeza y por ende se vuelve incómodo a la larga.Yo compre el BOBOVR M2 y es una maravilla, tomando casi el diseño del Rift s, el soporte que te da en el occipital y la facilidad de ajustarlo lo hacen un aditamento indispensable.Y eso es todo lo que yo considero necesario para poder disfrutar el visor al máximo.Edit: RECOMIENDO USAR OCULUS LINK, SI EL CABLE ALTERNATIVO LES LLEGA A FALLAR, YA NO COMPREN DE ESE TIPO, VAYANSE A LA SEGURA Y USEN EL ORIGINAL, AUNQUE SEA MÁS CARO.

Awesome experience with the new updated 128 gb version, i am still trying out new games but until now it has been a very good experience. Both my daughters 6 and 3 year old are enjoying it as well.First things first, you do not need a PC to use this VR headset, however if your an advanced gamer then you probably have a gaming pc that might work with PCVR games, others please check the minimum requirement before you buy a PC for PCVR gaming.Again note with this Quest 2 you do not need a PC it works standalone and you only need a good internet connection, you can buy or get free games from Oculus store or Sidequest, tons of video on youtube on how to use sidequest so check it out. Also you can install youtube and Netflix and use it to watch 360 videos and 3d  movies.Some complain of blurriness, so note you have to adjust the straps so that you are looking straight into it, everything in your periphery will be blur so adjust everytime you wear it, it should be sticking to your face tightly.If you have glasses then they need to be small as my computer glasses did not fit but i think you will have some problems when using it with glasses.Finally it absolutely fun to play with these, if you get it under 40 k for 128 GB then its a good deal in India , i tried shipping it out from US to India but the order was not completed as they do not ship things with battery so anyways buy it from here in India and it will be delivered the next day.

The best value for money standalone VR headset.Dont go for the negative review that it has bad lense or is cheap bla bla bla, cause you cant even find any VR standalone headset at this price.1. Quality is great, even if you drop it it wont break easily and still works, check out ThrillSeeker channel on youtube for more strees test that guy did.2. Lenses are old once, yes they are but in this segment they wont dissapoint you compared to $1000 Valve Index3. Resolution and FOV is good but not great but perfect for movies and watching 3d movies, 360 movies and Oculus games for sure. Casual user wont even find any difference4. Great library of games, litttle expensive but you get sales now and then and you have sidequest if you want more for free and also with some tricks you can install any android apps.5. The glimps and your start to metaverse6. Battery is a concern but get the cable creation cable and you are goog to go. Get the 16ft one7. Install Sidequest. (Mobile and PC) if you want a lot of best and free content and if you are a advanced PC user. Not recommended for users not fimiliar with advance PC use or adb, but you get a tons of tutorial on youtube if you want to try.8. If you have a good PC, VR ready GPU, then this can play Steam VR as well, now it has Airlink wireless as well, but you need Wifi6, 5ghz band and PC connected using ethernet for best quality.9. Amazing hand tracking and controllers at this range10. In any case you end up scratching the lenses, get a polywatch solution and see the magic, it would be as good as new, thank me later for that advice. See youtube for more info11. Great mutiplayer capabilities, mic is great and stock speaker are just awesome, and you can still connect your own headsets as well.12. Get a rechargable battery for your controller, cost around rs400 with batgery and its charger.13. If you still have more money get an Elite strap for best comfort and wobble free experience.14. If you sweat much, mind that you might see fog on lense on prolong use, there are tons of alrernatives to try to avoid that, but the cheapest option is simply put a tissue to your forehead and put on the headset and good to go.15. You are still here that means you are convinced, just go for it and buy it, you will not regret for sure. Search me in case you need more assistance on Oculus,  Ashura- is my Oculus id.

Realizei a compra através da loja DigitalFlash, o produto chegou rápido e é excelente! Vale muito a pena ter um Oculus Quest 2, parece ser resistente, tem ótima resposta dos comandos e fica bem preso na cabeça. Eu já tinha usado um VR do tipo que encaixa o celular como tela, mas não se compara com esse Oculus Quest que realmente foi feito pra isso. Vem com o Oculus e os controles, chegou rápido, a caixa estava lacrada e não estava danificada. Recomendo!

Produto maravilhoso, funciona perfeitamente, é MUITO divertido com toda certeza... O único problema é que tive um problema com o controle esquerdo... Como uso muito em games de tiro, utilizo o analógico do controle esquerdo com frequência, e acho que consequentemente ele começou a dar problema... De vez em quando ele fica mexendo sozinho o analógico pra baixo. Tentei entrar com o suporte da loja para poder trocar o controle, uma vez que faz aprox. 1 mês que estou com o produto, e na "elegibilidade de devolução/troca" está dizendo que faz 3 dias que venceu meu prazo para troca do produto e 2 dias para a devolução do mesmo. Mandei mensagem para a loja faz um tempo fazendo tal reclamação, porém não me responderam e agora perdi o prazo de troca/devolução.De qualquer maneira, o produto é maravilhoso, funciona perfeitamente (tirando o problema do controle que acho que foi mais má sorte minha mesmo, já que meus amigos que também tem, nunca tiveram esse problema), e minha reclamação fica apenas com o compromisso da loja com o cliente. Agora não sei como  posso arrumar o controle. E aqui onde moro não possui assistência técnica para isso... PRODUTO: Nota 9,5; Entrega: NOTA 9; VENDEDOR: 5.
review_title: INCRÍVEL, só tive um problema infortuno

one_reviews_text: El día de ayer después de casi tres semanas q los ordene los recibió de regalo mi pequeño, súper padres, la verdad se ve increíble, lo único a tomar en cuenta es q pesan un poco, son cómodos sin embargo no quita eso el peso, para quien sea amante de la tecnología les encantará, ya q la visión es increíble en la aplicación q elijas 3D, 4D, etc; puedes adquirir juegos dentro de los Oculus  y son perfectamente compatibles con la PS5 y con la Laptop, llegó perfectamente empacado, antes de tiempo, lamentablemente si tomen en cuenta  el costo de importación, esperemos no tengan ninguna falla  pues si siguen como lo han siseo el día de ayer y hasta el día de hoy podré asegurar q es una excelente compra, maravilloso regalo de cumpleaños
review_title: Ayer los abrió mi peque y son geniales

one_reviews_text: Chegou certinho, e rápido, pela loja Digital Flash, usei por um dia até agora, nenhum problema encontrado.

 Produto chegou rápido (7 dias) / Caixa muito linda e resistente / o óculos surpreende demais! Nos primeiros minutos da uma sensação estranha, mas depois é só alegria. Produto veio impecável, com todos os lacres intactos. Só não me agradou a bateria, pois dura cerca de 2 horas apenas, mas eu comprei um power bank para poder jogar por mais tempo, recomendo comprarem se não vão se decepcionar pelo tempo de duração. Produto maravilhoso, valeu a pena cada centavo investido / lembrando que os jogos da plataforma são absurdamente caros, mas existe pirataria pra tudo né? Eu mesmo já baixei uma porrada de jogos grátis pela plataforma “loader “.

Edito mi reseña por que servicio al cliente solucionó mi problema.Es un gran producto. La inmersión es genial, es sencillo de usar y cómodo al ser wireless. Recomiendo comprar una headband adicional por el peso. Tengo la pro con batería.Revisen la memoria desde settings por que la caja no lo indica y se pueden equivocar.

Ghosting effect, image at corner of the lens  blurry, all good games are paid in range of Rs 1500-2500 which are very costly seeing the quality.After spending 35k, you need to spend 4-5k for storage and its scratch protection films which are mot easily available.Build Quality is great but color is white due to which it easily catches dust and scratches. Just good for 1 day experience.Overall, not price worth for given graphics, VR quality and performance.Logical to purchase after 2-3years if any worthy PC games are ported and price of available games are reduced.
review_title: Not worth the price and time.

one_reviews_text: La verdad que he probado por primera vez las VR y puedo decir que es bastante asombroso hay mucho que se puede hacer utilizando directamente las quest 2 o conectándolas a las pc, puedo decir que es bastante practica, los controles son muy inmersos y cómodos en su totalidad, por otro lado tienes funciones como usar los dedos de las manos como mando gracias a las cámaras de la parte de abajo para controlar las quest 2, compatible también si lo usas en pc. Puedo decir que tiene bastantes accesorios que hacen que el Quest 2 sea aun mas cómodo.Igualmente vi un par de observaciones y me atrevo a responderlas.Lo de la distancia de los ojos, cuenta solo con tres modos y puedo decir que directamente puede ser conflictivo para persona que se encuentran fuera del rango que tiene, por lo que he visto en otros videos sobre su antecesor este no tenia el problema por que se ajustaba un poco mas libre.Vista ligeramente borrosa esto si lo puedo confirmar pero igual no es algo que sea tan grave ya que al estar jugando no lo notas.La duración de la autonomía.A esto si pude notar que dura solo 2 horas, pero pues tengamos en cuenta el por que teniendo lo del seguimiento de los mandos las 4 cámaras que tiene en funcionamiento en todo momento para la inmersión en vr, una pantalla que casi da 2k a 120hz y una potencia que considero muy buena pues hace que todo esto se gaste rápido.¿Como lo soluciono? Pues solo compra una PowerBank ya sea de 10000 MaH o 20000, con eso te dará suficiente para jugar durante unas 4 o 6 horas, al menos a mi me ha dado ese tiempo.Por otro lado la duración de la batería de los mandos es bastante larga eso si lo puedo asegurar.Temperatura.En lugares donde tengas ventilación y no en temperatura normal podrás notar que no se calienta, pero al andar en lugares donde no tengas ventilación y a temperatura normal vas a ver que si se calienta como cuando juegas con tu teléfono a brillo máximoHe leido algunas observaciones de lo que es el Oculus Quest 2 sobre lo que es que puede ser incomodoCosas que podrían ser desventaja?Pues el hecho de que requiere una cuenta obligatoria de Facebook para poder utilizarlo quizas para la mayoría dirá "MEH tengo cuenta de Facebook" pero recordemos que hay gente que no le gusta dicha plataforma y considero que pues no es necesario, igualmente la desventaja esta que las aplicaciones que hayas adquiridos se enlazan con dicha cuenta, si pierdes esa cuenta pierdes las aplicaciones. Y pues igual he leído algunas reseñas que dicen "Me cree una cuenta de Facebook y a la semana me la bloquearon por que decían que era cuenta falsa y perdí todas las aplicaciones adquiridas".Por otro lado el sujetador es de un material de plástico y tela que a largo plazo de utilidad es incomodo, por suerte se pueden comprar otros sujetadores mas cómodos.¿Como se conecta a la PC?Existen dos maneras la primera es usando AirLink que considero poco practico y problemático al menos de las veces que intente usar la pc, por otro lado puedes adquirir Virtual Desktop que cuesta 15 Dolares que pues igualmente lo mismo, pero este si es completamente practico. La segunda opción seria utilizando solo  un cable que sea de 3.0 o superior, que por lo menos con uno de un Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 pro me ha servido.Lo vale? Si honestamente lo vale por la cantidad de juegos gratuitos que puedes descargar tanto en la plataforma oculus o de sidequest o también jugando en la PC.OJO: La foto con el sujetador actual se compro por separado no es el original.
review_title: ¿Eres nuevo en realidad virtual? Pues esto es para ti!
